description: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun's rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Bulbasaur, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Bulbasaur, gShinyOverworldPalette_Bulbasaur )

description: To support its bulb, Ivysaur's legs grow sturdy. If it spends more time lying in the sunlight, the bud will soon bloom into a large flower.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Ivysaur, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Ivysaur, gShinyOverworldPalette_Ivysaur )

description: Venusaur's flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower's aroma soothes the emotions of people.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_VenusaurF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: In order to support its flower, which has grown larger due to Mega Evolution, its back and legs have become stronger.
Spits big amounts of pollen like a volcano. Breathing too much of it causes fainting. In battle, it swings around two thick vines that can easily topple 10-story buildings.
The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when Charmander is happy, and blazes when it is enraged.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Charmander, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Charmander, gShinyOverworldPalette_Charmander )

description: Without pity, its sharp claws destroy foes. If it encounters a strong enemy, it becomes agitated, and the flame on its tail flares with a bluish white color.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Charmeleon, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Charmeleon, gShinyOverworldPalette_Charmeleon )

description: A Charizard flies about in search of strong opponents. It breathes intense flames that can melt any material. However, it will never torch a weaker foe.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Charizard, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Charizard, gShinyOverworldPalette_Charizard )

description: The overwhelming power that fills its entire body causes it to turn black and creates intense blue flames.
Its bond with its Trainer is the source of its power. It boasts speed and maneuverability greater than that of a jet fighter.
The flame inside its body burns hotter than 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit. When Charizard roars, that temperature climbs even higher.
Its shell is not just for protection. Its rounded shape and the grooves on its surface minimize resistance in water, enabling Squirtle to swim at high speeds.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Squirtle, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Squirtle, gShinyOverworldPalette_Squirtle )

description: Its large tail is covered with rich, thick fur that deepens in color with age. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokémon's toughness in battle.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Wartortle, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Wartortle, gShinyOverworldPalette_Wartortle )

description: The waterspouts that protrude from its shell are highly accurate. Their bullets of water can precisely nail tin cans from a distance of over 160 feet.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Blastoise, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Blastoise, gShinyOverworldPalette_Blastoise )

description: The cannon on its back is as powerful as a tank gun. Its tough legs and back enable it to withstand the recoil from firing the cannon.
It's not very good at precision shooting. When attacking, it just fires its 31 cannons over and over and over.
Its voracious appetite compels it to devour leaves bigger than itself without hesitation. It releases a terribly strong odor from its antennae.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Caterpie, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT, gOverworldPalette_Caterpie, gShinyOverworldPalette_Caterpie )

description: Its shell is as hard as an iron slab. A Metapod does not move very much because it is preparing its soft innards for evolution inside the shell.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Metapod, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT, gOverworldPalette_Metapod, gShinyOverworldPalette_Metapod )

description: It has a superior ability to search for delicious honey from flowers. It can seek, extract, and carry honey from flowers blooming over six miles away.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_ButterfreeF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: Once it has opponents trapped in a tornado that could blow away a 10- ton truck, it finishes them off with its poisonous scales.
A Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It distinguishes its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes by sniffing with its big red nose.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Weedle, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT, gOverworldPalette_Weedle, gShinyOverworldPalette_Weedle )

description: It remains virtually immobile while it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it busily prepares for evolution. This is evident from how hot its shell becomes.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Kakuna, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT, gOverworldPalette_Kakuna, gShinyOverworldPalette_Kakuna )

description: A Beedrill is extremely territorial. For safety reasons, no one should ever approach its nest. If angered, they will attack in a swarm.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Beedrill, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Beedrill, gShinyOverworldPalette_Beedrill )

description: Its legs have become poison stingers. It stabs its prey repeatedly with the stingers on its limbs, dealing the final blow with the stinger on its rear.
It has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It can unerringly return home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Pidgey, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Pidgey, gShinyOverworldPalette_Pidgey )

description: This Pokémon flies around, patrolling its large territory. If its living space is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Pidgeotto, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Pidgeotto, gShinyOverworldPalette_Pidgeotto )

description: This Pokémon has gorgeous, glossy feathers. Many Trainers are so captivated by the beautiful feathers on its head that they choose Pidgeot as their Pokémon.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Pidgeot, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Pidgeot, gShinyOverworldPalette_Pidgeot )

description: With its muscular strength now greatly increased, it can fly continuously for two weeks without resting.
A Rattata is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly moves its ears and listens for danger. It will make its nest anywhere.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_RattataF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: A Raticate's sturdy fangs grow steadily. To keep them ground down, it gnaws on rocks and logs. It may even chew on the walls of houses.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_RaticateF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: With its incisors, it gnaws through doors and infiltrates people's homes. Then, with a twitch of its whiskers, it steals whatever food it finds.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_RattataAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_RattataAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_RattataAlola )
OVERWORLD( sPicTable_RaticateAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_RaticateAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_RaticateAlola )
OVERWORLD( sPicTable_RaticateAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_RaticateAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_RaticateAlola )

description: Its loud cry can be heard over half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Spearow, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Spearow, gShinyOverworldPalette_Spearow )

description: Its long neck and elongated beak are ideal for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves this extended and skinny beak to pluck prey.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Fearow, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Fearow, gShinyOverworldPalette_Fearow )

description: An Ekans curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. This position allows it to quickly respond to an enemy from any direction with a threat from its upraised head.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Ekans, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SLITHER, gOverworldPalette_Ekans, gShinyOverworldPalette_Ekans )

description: This Pokémon has a terrifically strong constricting power. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once it wraps its body around its foe, escaping is impossible.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Arbok, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SLITHER, gOverworldPalette_Arbok, gShinyOverworldPalette_Arbok )
OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Pichu, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Pichu, gShinyOverworldPalette_Pichu )

OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_PikachuF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: This Pikachu wears its partner's cap, which is proof of the strong bond Pikachu and its partner formed during adventures across many different regions.
This Pikachu wears its partner's cap, which is proof of the strong bond Pikachu and its partner formed during adventures across the Hoenn region together.
This Pikachu wears its partner's cap, which is proof of the strong bond Pikachu and its partner formed during adventures across the Sinnoh region together.
This Pikachu wears its partner's cap, which is proof of the strong bond Pikachu and its partner formed during adventures across the Unova region together.
This Pikachu wears its partner's cap, which is proof of the strong bond Pikachu and its partner formed during adventures across the Kalos region together.
This Pikachu wears its partner's cap, which is proof of the strong bond Pikachu and its partner formed during adventures across the Alola region together.
This Pikachu wears its partner's cap, which is proof of the strong bond Pikachu and its partner formed as the two overcame many hardships together.
This Pikachu wears its partner's cap, which is proof of the strong bond Pikachu and its partner formed during adventures across the world together.
When it smashes its opponents with its bolt-shaped tail, it delivers a surge of electricity equivalent to a lightning strike.

overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Pikachu, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Pikachu, gShinyOverworldPalette_Pikachu )

description: If it stores too much electricity, its behavior turns aggressive. To avoid this, it occasionally discharges excess energy and calms itself down.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_RaichuF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: It uses psychokinesis to control electricity. It focuses psychic energy into its tail and rides it like it's surfing. Another name for this Pokémon is 'hodad'.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_RaichuAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_RaichuAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_RaichuAlola )

description: When it curls up in a ball, it can make any attack bounce off harmlessly. Its hide has turned tough and solid as a result of living in the desert.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Sandshrew, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Sandshrew, gShinyOverworldPalette_Sandshrew )

description: It curls up in a ball to protect itself from enemy attacks. It also curls up to prevent heatstroke during the daytime when temperatures rise sharply.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Sandslash, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Sandslash, gShinyOverworldPalette_Sandslash )

description: Life on mountains covered with deep snow has granted this Pokémon a body of ice that's as hard as steel. Predators go after its soft belly.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_SandshrewAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_SandshrewAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_SandshrewAlola )

description: It uses large, hooked claws to cut a path through deep snow as it runs. On snowy mountains, this Sandslash is faster than any other Pokémon.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_SandslashAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_SandslashAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_SandslashAlola )

description: Its highly toxic barbs are thought to have developed as protection for this small- bodied Pokémon. When enraged, it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_NidoranF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_NidoranF, gShinyOverworldPalette_NidoranF )

description: When it is with its friends or family, its barbs are tucked away to prevent injury. It appears to become nervous if separated from the others.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Nidorina, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Nidorina, gShinyOverworldPalette_Nidorina )

description: It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles using its tough, scaly body. This Pokémon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Nidoqueen, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Nidoqueen, gShinyOverworldPalette_Nidoqueen )

description: The male Nidoran has developed muscles that freely move its ears in any direction. Even the slightest sound does not escape this Pokémon's notice.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_NidoranM, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_NidoranM, gShinyOverworldPalette_NidoranM )

description: Its horn is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Nidorino, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Nidorino, gShinyOverworldPalette_Nidorino )

description: A Nidoking's thick tail packs enormously destructive power capable of toppling a metal transmission tower. Once it goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Nidoking, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Nidoking, gShinyOverworldPalette_Nidoking )

description: On nights with many shooting stars, Cleffa can be seen dancing in a ring. They dance until daybreak, when they quench their thirst with the morning dew.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Cleffa, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Cleffa, gShinyOverworldPalette_Cleffa )

description: On every night of a full moon, they come out to play. When dawn arrives, the tired Clefairy go to sleep nestled up against each other in deep and quiet mountains.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Clefairy, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Clefairy, gShinyOverworldPalette_Clefairy )

description: A Clefable uses its wings to skip lightly  as if it were flying. Its bouncy step lets it even walk on water. On quiet, moonlit nights, it strolls on lakes.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Clefable, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Clefable, gShinyOverworldPalette_Clefable )

description: It can freely control fire, making fiery orbs fly like will-o'-the-wisps. Just before evolution, its six tails grow hot  as if on fire.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Vulpix, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Vulpix, gShinyOverworldPalette_Vulpix )

description: It has long been said that each of the nine tails embody an enchanted power. A long-lived Ninetales will have fur that shines like gold.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Ninetales, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Ninetales, gShinyOverworldPalette_Ninetales )

description: They live together in a skulk, helping one another. In hot weather, this Pokémon makes ice shards with its six tails and sprays them around to cool itself off.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_VulpixAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_VulpixAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_VulpixAlola )

description: While it will guide travelers who get lost on a snowy mountain down to the mountain's base, it won't forgive anyone who harms nature.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_NinetalesAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_NinetalesAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_NinetalesAlola )

description: Its soft and pliable body is very bouncy. When it sings continuously with all its might, its body steadily turns a deepening pink color.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Igglybuff, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Igglybuff, gShinyOverworldPalette_Igglybuff )

description: Nothing can avoid falling asleep hearing a Jigglypuff's song. The sound waves of its singing voice match the brain waves of someone in a deep sleep.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Jigglypuff, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Jigglypuff, gShinyOverworldPalette_Jigglypuff )

description: Its fur is the ultimate in luxuriousness. Sleeping alongside a Wigglytuff is simply divine. Its body expands seemingly without end when it inhales.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Wigglytuff, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Wigglytuff, gShinyOverworldPalette_Wigglytuff )

description: While living in pitch-black caverns, their eyes gradually grew shut and deprived them of vision. They use ultrasonic waves to detect obstacles.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_ZubatF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: Its fangs easily puncture even thick animal hide. It loves to feast on the blood of people and Pokémon. It flits about in darkness and strikes from behind.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_GolbatF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: Over the course of evolution, its hind legs turned into wings. By alternately resting its front and rear wings, it can fly all day without having to stop.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Crobat, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_Crobat, gShinyOverworldPalette_Crobat )

description: This Pokémon grows by absorbing moonlight. During the daytime, it buries itself in the ground, leaving only its leaves exposed to avoid detection by its enemies.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Oddish, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Oddish, gShinyOverworldPalette_Oddish )

description: A horribly noxious honey drools from its mouth. One whiff of the honey can result in memory loss. Some fans are said to enjoy this overwhelming stink, however.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_GloomF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: In seasons when it produces more pollen, the air around a Vileplume turns yellow with the powder as it walks. The pollen is highly toxic and causes paralysis.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_VileplumeF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: Its flower petals deepen in color through exposure to sunlight. When cloudy weather persists, it does a dance that is thought to be a ritual for summoning the sun.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Bellossom, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Bellossom, gShinyOverworldPalette_Bellossom )

description: A Paras has parasitic tochukaso mushrooms growing on its back. They grow by drawing nutrients from the host. They are valued as a medicine for long life.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Paras, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_BUG, gOverworldPalette_Paras, gShinyOverworldPalette_Paras )

description: Parasect are known to infest the roots of large trees en masse and drain nutrients. When an infested tree dies, they move onto another tree all at once.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Parasect, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_BUG, gOverworldPalette_Parasect, gShinyOverworldPalette_Parasect )

description: Its coat of thin, stiff hair that covers its entire body is said to have evolved for protection. Its large eyes never fail to spot even miniscule prey.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Venonat, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Venonat, gShinyOverworldPalette_Venonat )

description: Venomoth are nocturnal--they are only active at night. Their favorite prey are insects that gather around streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Venomoth, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Venomoth, gShinyOverworldPalette_Venomoth )

description: Diglett are raised in most farms. The reason is simple--wherever they burrow, the soil is left perfectly tilled for growing delicious crops.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Diglett, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_Diglett, gShinyOverworldPalette_Diglett )

description: Because the triplets originally split from one body, they think exactly alike. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly through the ground.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Dugtrio, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_Dugtrio, gShinyOverworldPalette_Dugtrio )

description: The metal-rich geology of its habitat caused it to develop steel whiskers on its head that change shape depending on its mood and when communicating with others.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_DiglettAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_DiglettAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_DiglettAlola )

description: Their beautiful, metallic whiskers create a sort of protective helmet on heir heads, and they also function as highly precise sensors.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_DugtrioAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_DugtrioAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_DugtrioAlola )

description: Meowth withdraw their sharp claws into their paws to silently sneak about. For some reason, this Pokémon loves shiny coins that glitter with light.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Meowth, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Meowth, gShinyOverworldPalette_Meowth )

description: A Persian's six bold whiskers sense air movements to determine what is in its vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Persian, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Persian, gShinyOverworldPalette_Persian )

description: It's accustomed to luxury because it used to live with Alolan royalty. Highly smart and proud, it's famously difficult to handle, but that also makes it popular.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_MeowthAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_MeowthAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_MeowthAlola )

description: It looks down on everyone other than itself. In contrast to its lovely face, it is so brutal that it tortures its weakened prey rather than finishing them off.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_PersianAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_PersianAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_PersianAlola )

description: Living with a savage, seafaring people has hardened its body so much that parts of it turned to iron. Darker coins are harder and garner more respect among Meowth.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_MeowthGalar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_MeowthGalar, gShinyOverworldPalette_MeowthGalar )

description: What appears to be an iron helmet is actually hardened hair. This Pokémon lives for the thrill of battle.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Perrserker, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Perrserker, gShinyOverworldPalette_Perrserker )

description: The pattern that has appeared on its giant coin is thought to be the key to unlocking the secrets of the Dynamax phenomenon.
When its headache intensifies, it starts using strange powers. However, it has no recollection of its powers, so it always looks befuddled and bewildered.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Psyduck, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Psyduck, gShinyOverworldPalette_Psyduck )

description: A Golduck is an adept swimmer. It sometimes joins competitive swimmers in training. It uses psychic powers when its forehead shimmers with light.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Golduck, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Golduck, gShinyOverworldPalette_Golduck )

description: When it starts shaking and its nasal breathing turns rough, it's a sure sign of anger. However, since this happens instantly, there is no time to flee.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Mankey, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Mankey, gShinyOverworldPalette_Mankey )

description: When it becomes furious, its blood circulation becomes more robust, and its muscles are made stronger. But it also becomes much less intelligent.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Primeape, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Primeape, gShinyOverworldPalette_Primeape )

description: When its anger rose beyond a critical point, this Pokémon gained power that is unfettered by the limits of its physical body.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Annihilape, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Annihilape, gShinyOverworldPalette_Annihilape )

description: Its superb sense of smell ensures that this Pokémon won't forget any scent, no matter what. It uses its sense of smell to detect the emotions of others.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Growlithe, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Growlithe, gShinyOverworldPalette_Growlithe )

description: This fleet-footed Pokémon is said to run over 6,200 miles in a single day and night. The fire that blazes wildly within its body is its source of power.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Arcanine, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Arcanine, gShinyOverworldPalette_Arcanine )

description: They patrol their territory in pairs. It's believed the igneous rock components in the fur of this species are the result of volcanic activity in its habitat.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_GrowlitheHisui, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_GrowlitheHisui, gShinyOverworldPalette_GrowlitheHisui )

description: Snaps at its foes with fangs cloaked in blazing flame. Despite its bulk, it deftly feints every which way, leading opponents on a deceptively merry chase.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_ArcanineHisui, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_ArcanineHisui, gShinyOverworldPalette_ArcanineHisui )

description: It is possible to see this Pokémon's spiral innards right through its thin skin. However, the skin is also very flexible. Even sharp fangs bounce right off it.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Poliwag, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Poliwag, gShinyOverworldPalette_Poliwag )

description: Its body surface is always wet and slick with an oily fluid. Because of this greasy covering, it can easily slip and slide out of the clutches of any enemy in battle.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Poliwhirl, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Poliwhirl, gShinyOverworldPalette_Poliwhirl )

description: Its highly developed muscles never grow fatigued, however much it exercises. This Pokémon can swim back and forth across the Pacific Ocean without effort.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Poliwrath, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Poliwrath, gShinyOverworldPalette_Poliwrath )

description: The curled hair on its head proves its status as a king. It is said that the longer and curlier the hair, the more respect it earns from its peers.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_PolitoedF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: A Pokémon that sleeps 18 hours a day. Observation revealed that it uses Teleport to change its location once every hour.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Abra, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_Abra, gShinyOverworldPalette_Abra )
OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_KadabraF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE )
OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_AlakazamF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE )

description: Having traded away its muscles, Alakazam's true power has been unleashed. With its psychic powers, it can foresee all things.
It continually undertakes strenuous training to master all forms of martial arts. Its strength lets it easily hoist a sumo wrestler onto its shoulders.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Machop, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Machop, gShinyOverworldPalette_Machop )

description: A belt is worn by a Machoke to keep its overwhelming power under control. Because it is so dangerous, no one has ever removed the belt.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Machoke, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Machoke, gShinyOverworldPalette_Machoke )

description: It is impossible to defend against punches and chops doled out by its four arms. Its fighting spirit flares up when it faces a tough opponent.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Machamp, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Machamp, gShinyOverworldPalette_Machamp )

description: One of these Pokémon once used its immeasurable strength to lift a large ship that was in trouble. It then carried the ship to port.
A Bellsprout's thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway to avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth, it leaks a fluid that melts even iron.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Bellsprout, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Bellsprout, gShinyOverworldPalette_Bellsprout )

description: At night, a Weepinbell hangs on to a tree branch with its hooked rear and sleeps. If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itself on the ground.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Weepinbell, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT, gOverworldPalette_Weepinbell, gShinyOverworldPalette_Weepinbell )

description: The long vine extending from its head is waved about as if it were a living thing to attract prey. When an unsuspecting victim approaches, it is swallowed whole.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Victreebel, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT, gOverworldPalette_Victreebel, gShinyOverworldPalette_Victreebel )

description: Its body is almost entirely composed of water. It ensnares its foe with its two long tentacles, then stabs with the poison stingers at their tips.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Tentacool, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT, gOverworldPalette_Tentacool, gShinyOverworldPalette_Tentacool )

description: It lives in complex rock formations on the ocean floor and traps prey using its 80 tentacles. Its red orbs glow when it grows excited or agitated.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Tentacruel, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_BUG, gOverworldPalette_Tentacruel, gShinyOverworldPalette_Tentacruel )

description: It climbs mountain paths using only the power of its arms. Because they look just like boulders lining paths, hikers may step on them without noticing.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Geodude, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT, gOverworldPalette_Geodude, gShinyOverworldPalette_Geodude )

description: They descend from mountains by tumbling down steep slopes. They are so brutal, they smash aside obstructing trees and massive boulders with thunderous tackles.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Graveler, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Graveler, gShinyOverworldPalette_Graveler )

description: It is said to live in volcanic craters on mountain peaks. Once a year, it sheds its hide and grows larger. The shed hide crumbles and returns to the soil.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Golem, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Golem, gShinyOverworldPalette_Golem )

description: Its body is a magnetic stone. Iron sand attach to parts of its body with stronger magnetism. If you carelessly step on one, it will headbutt and shock you in anger.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_GeodudeAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_GeodudeAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_GeodudeAlola )

description: When two Graveler smash each other over dravite, their favorite food, they cause flashes of light and booming noises. People call them “fireworks of the earth.”
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_GravelerAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_GravelerAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_GravelerAlola )

description: It fires rocks charged with electricity. Even if the rock isn't fired that accurately, just grazing an opponent will cause numbness and fainting.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_GolemAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_GolemAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_GolemAlola )

description: A Ponyta is very weak at birth. It can barely stand up. Its legs become stronger as it stumbles and falls while trying to keep up with its parent.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Ponyta, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Ponyta, gShinyOverworldPalette_Ponyta )

description: It usually canters casually in the fields and plains. But once a Rapidash turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Rapidash, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Rapidash, gShinyOverworldPalette_Rapidash )

description: Its small horn hides a healing power. This Pokémon will look into your eyes and read the contents of your heart. If it finds evil there, it promptly hides away.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_PonytaGalar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_PonytaGalar, gShinyOverworldPalette_PonytaGalar )

description: Little can stand up to its psycho cut. Unleashed from this Pokémon's horn, the move will punch a hole right through a thick metal sheet.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_RapidashGalar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_RapidashGalar, gShinyOverworldPalette_RapidashGalar )

description: It catches prey by dipping its tail in water at the side of a river. But it often forgets what it is doing and spends entire days just loafing at water's edge.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Slowpoke, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Slowpoke, gShinyOverworldPalette_Slowpoke )

description: Its tail has a Shellder firmly attached with a bite. As a result, the tail can't be used for fishing anymore. This forces it to reluctantly swim and catch prey.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Slowbro, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Slowbro, gShinyOverworldPalette_Slowbro )

description: It undertakes research every day to solve the mysteries of the world. However, it apparently forgets everything if the Shellder on its head comes off.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Slowking, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Slowking, gShinyOverworldPalette_Slowking )

description: When bathed in the energy of Mega Evolution, Shellder converts into impregnable armor. There is virtually no change in Slowpoke.
Although it is normally zoned out, its expression abruptly sharpens on occasion. The cause seems to lie in Slowpoke's diet, which also give their tails a spicy flavor.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_SlowpokeGalar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_SlowpokeGalar, gShinyOverworldPalette_SlowpokeGalar )

description: A Shellder bite set off a chemical reaction with the spices inside Slowbro's body, causing Slowbro to become a Poison-type Pokémon.
overworld: OVERWORLD_SET_ANIM( sPicTable_SlowbroGalar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, sAnimTable_Following_Asym, gOverworldPalette_SlowbroGalar, gShinyOverworldPalette_SlowbroGalar )

description: A combination of toxins and the shock of evolving has increased Shellder's intelligence to the point that Shellder now controls Slowking.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_SlowkingGalar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_SlowkingGalar, gShinyOverworldPalette_SlowkingGalar )

description: The units at its sides are extremely powerful magnets. They generate enough magnetism to draw in iron objects from over 300 feet away.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Magnemite, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_Magnemite, gShinyOverworldPalette_Magnemite )

description: It is actually three Magnemite linked by magnetism. It generates powerful radio waves that raise temperatures by 3.6 degrees F within a 3,300-foot radius.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Magneton, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_Magneton, gShinyOverworldPalette_Magneton )

description: As it zooms through the sky, this Pokémon seems to be receiving signals of unknown origin, while transmitting its own signals of unknown purpose.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Magnezone, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Magnezone, gShinyOverworldPalette_Magnezone )

description: It is always seen with a stick from a plant. Apparently, there are good sticks and bad sticks. This Pokémon occasionally fights with others over choice sticks.
overworld: OVERWORLD_SET_ANIM( sPicTable_Farfetchd, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, sAnimTable_Following_Asym, gOverworldPalette_Farfetchd, gShinyOverworldPalette_Farfetchd )

description: The stalks of leeks are thicker and longer in the Galar region. Brave Farfetch'd warriors that adapted to these stalks took on a unique form.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_FarfetchdGalar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_FarfetchdGalar, gShinyOverworldPalette_FarfetchdGalar )

description: Only Farfetch'd that have survived many battles can attain this evolution. When this Pokémon's leek withers, it will retire from combat.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Sirfetchd, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Sirfetchd, gShinyOverworldPalette_Sirfetchd )

description: Even while eating or sleeping, one of the heads remains always vigilant for any sign of danger. When threatened, it flees at over 60 miles per hour.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_DoduoF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: A peculiar Pokémon species with three heads. It vigorously races across grassy plains even in arid seasons with little rainfall.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_DodrioF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: Seel hunt for prey in frigid, ice-covered seas. When it needs to breathe, it punches a hole through the ice with the sharply protruding section of its head.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Seel, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SLITHER, gOverworldPalette_Seel, gShinyOverworldPalette_Seel )

description: It loves to snooze on bitterly cold ice. The sight of this Pokémon sleeping on a glacier was mistakenly thought to be a mermaid by a mariner long ago.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Dewgong, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Dewgong, gShinyOverworldPalette_Dewgong )

description: Born from polluted sludge in the sea, Grimer's favorite food is anything filthy. They feed on wastewater pumped out from factories.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Grimer, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SLITHER, gOverworldPalette_Grimer, gShinyOverworldPalette_Grimer )

description: It prefers warm and humid habitats. In the summertime, the toxic substances in its body intensify, making Muk reek like putrid kitchen garbage.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Muk, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SLITHER, gOverworldPalette_Muk, gShinyOverworldPalette_Muk )

description: There are a hundred or so of them living in Alola's waste-disposal site. They're all hard workers who eat a lot of trash. Grimer seems to relish any and all kinds of trash.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_GrimerAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_GrimerAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_GrimerAlola )

description: While it's unexpectedly quiet and friendly, if it's not fed any trash for a while, it will smash its Trainer's furnishings, and eat up the fragments.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_MukAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_MukAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_MukAlola )

description: At night, it burrows a hole in the seafloor with its broad tongue to make a place to sleep. While asleep, it closes its shell, but leaves its tongue hanging out.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Shellder, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT, gOverworldPalette_Shellder, gShinyOverworldPalette_Shellder )

description: It swims in the sea by swallowing water, then jetting it out toward the rear. The Cloyster shoots spikes from its shell using the same system.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Cloyster, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_Cloyster, gShinyOverworldPalette_Cloyster )

description: When exposed to a strong wind, a Gastly's gaseous body quickly dwindles away. They cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Gastly, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_Gastly, gShinyOverworldPalette_Gastly )

description: If a Haunter beckons you while it is floating in darkness, don't approach it. This Pokémon will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Haunter, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_Haunter, gShinyOverworldPalette_Haunter )

description: Deep in the night, your shadow cast by a streetlight may suddenly overtake you. It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Gengar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Gengar, gShinyOverworldPalette_Gengar )

description: Gengar's relationships are warped. It tries to take the lives of anyone and everyone. It will even try to curse the Trainer who is its master!
Rumor has it that its gigantic mouth leads not into its body, filled with cursed energy, but instead directly to the afterlife.
There is a magnet in its brain that prevents an Onix from losing direction while tunneling. As it grows older, its body becomes steadily rounder and smoother.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Onix, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SLITHER, gOverworldPalette_Onix, gShinyOverworldPalette_Onix )

description: Steelix live even further underground than Onix. This Pokémon is known to dig toward the earth's core, reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_SteelixF, SIZE_64x64, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SLITHER )

description: The cells within its body, crystallized by the energy produced from Mega Evolution, are stronger than any mineral and able to withstand any temperature.
If your nose becomes itchy while you are sleeping, it's a sure sign that a Drowzee is standing above your pillow and trying to eat your dream through your nostrils.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Drowzee, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Drowzee, gShinyOverworldPalette_Drowzee )

description: The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum in a Hypno's hand lull the foe into deep hypnosis. While searching for prey, it polishes the pendulum.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_HypnoF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: Krabby live in holes dug into beaches. On sandy shores with little in the way of food, they can be seen squabbling with each other over territory.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Krabby, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Krabby, gShinyOverworldPalette_Krabby )

description: It waves its huge, oversized claw in the air to communicate with others. But since the claw is so heavy, this Pokémon quickly tires.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Kingler, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Kingler, gShinyOverworldPalette_Kingler )

description: The flow of Mega energy has spurred this Pokémon's left pincer to grow to an enormous size. That claw can pulverize anything.
It bears an uncanny and unexplained resemblance to a Poké Ball. Because it explodes at the slightest shock, even veteran Trainers treat it with caution.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Voltorb, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT, gOverworldPalette_Voltorb, gShinyOverworldPalette_Voltorb )

description: They appear in great numbers at electric power plants. Because they feed on electricity, they cause massive and chaotic blackouts in nearby cities.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Electrode, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT, gOverworldPalette_Electrode, gShinyOverworldPalette_Electrode )

description: It esembles an ancient Poké Ball design. When excited, it discharges the electric current it has stored in its belly, then lets out a great, uproarious laugh.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_VoltorbHisui, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_VoltorbHisui, gShinyOverworldPalette_VoltorbHisui )

description: The tissue on the surface of its body is similar in composition to an Apricorn. When irritated, it lets loose an electric current equal to 20 lightning bolts.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_ElectrodeHisui, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_ElectrodeHisui, gShinyOverworldPalette_ElectrodeHisui )

description: It consists of six eggs that care for each other. The eggs attract each other and spin around. When cracks increasingly appear, it is close to evolution.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Exeggcute, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT, gOverworldPalette_Exeggcute, gShinyOverworldPalette_Exeggcute )

description: Originally from the tropics, Exeggutor's heads grow larger from exposure to strong sunlight. It is said that when the heads fall, they group to form an Exeggcute.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Exeggutor, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Exeggutor, gShinyOverworldPalette_Exeggutor )

description: Alola is the best environment for this Pokémon. Local people take pride in its appearance, saying this is how Exeggutor ought to look.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_ExeggutorAlola, SIZE_64x64, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_ExeggutorAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_ExeggutorAlola )

description: It pines for the mother it will never see again. Seeing a likeness of its mother in the full moon, it cries. The stains on the skull it wears are from its tears.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Cubone, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Cubone, gShinyOverworldPalette_Cubone )

description: A Marowak is the evolved form of a Cubone that has grown tough by overcoming the grief of losing its mother. Its tempered and hardened spirit is not easily broken.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Marowak, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Marowak, gShinyOverworldPalette_Marowak )
OVERWORLD( sPicTable_MarowakAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_MarowakAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_MarowakAlola )
OVERWORLD( sPicTable_MarowakAlola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_MarowakAlola, gShinyOverworldPalette_MarowakAlola )

description: Tyrogue become stressed out if they do not get to train every day. When raising this Pokémon, the Trainer must establish a regular training schedule.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Tyrogue, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Tyrogue, gShinyOverworldPalette_Tyrogue )

description: Its legs freely stretch and contract. Using these springlike limbs, it bowls over foes with devastating kicks. After battle, it rubs down its tired legs.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Hitmonlee, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Hitmonlee, gShinyOverworldPalette_Hitmonlee )

description: A Hitmonchan is said to possess the spirit of a boxer who aimed to become the world champion. Having an indomitable spirit means that it will never give up.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Hitmonchan, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Hitmonchan, gShinyOverworldPalette_Hitmonchan )

description: Its technique of kicking while spinning is a remarkable mix of both offense and defense. Hitmontop travel faster spinning than they do walking.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Hitmontop, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Hitmontop, gShinyOverworldPalette_Hitmontop )

description: Whenever it sees something unfamiliar, it always licks the object because it memorizes things by texture and taste. It is somewhat put off by sour things.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Lickitung, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Lickitung, gShinyOverworldPalette_Lickitung )

description: The long tongue is always soggy with slobber. The saliva contains a solvent that causes numbness. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Lickilicky, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Lickilicky, gShinyOverworldPalette_Lickilicky )

description: Getting up close to a Koffing will give you a chance to observe, through its thin skin, the toxic gases swirling inside. It blows up at the slightest stimulation.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Koffing, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_Koffing, gShinyOverworldPalette_Koffing )

description: By diluting its toxic gases with a special process, the highest grade of perfume can be extracted. To Weezing, gases emanating from garbage are the ultimate feast.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Weezing, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_Weezing, gShinyOverworldPalette_Weezing )

description: Long ago, when droves of factories fouled the air with pollution, it changed into this form for some reason. It consumes air pollutant particles, expelling clean air.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_WeezingGalar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_WeezingGalar, gShinyOverworldPalette_WeezingGalar )

description: Once it starts running, it doesn't stop. Its tiny brain makes it so stupid that it can't remember why it started running in the first place.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_RhyhornF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: Its horn, which rotates like a drill, destroys tall buildings with one strike. It stands on its hind legs, and its brain is well developed.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_RhydonF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: It can launch a rock held in its hand like a missile by tightening and then expanding its muscles instantaneously. Geodude are shot at rare times.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_RhyperiorF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: It carries a round white rock in its belly pouch. If it gets along well with someone, it will sometimes give that person the rock.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Happiny, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Happiny, gShinyOverworldPalette_Happiny )

description: Chansey lay nutritionally excellent eggs every day. The eggs are so delicious, they are eagerly devoured by even those people who have lost their appetite.

description: If it senses sadness with its fluffy fur, a Blissey will rush over to the sad person, however far away, to share an egg of happiness that brings a smile to any face.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Blissey, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Blissey, gShinyOverworldPalette_Blissey )

description: Its vines snap off easily and painlessly if they are grabbed, allowing it to make a quick getaway. The lost vines are replaced by new growth the very next day.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Tangela, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Tangela, gShinyOverworldPalette_Tangela )

description: If you come across a young Kangaskhan playing by itself, never try to catch it. The baby's parent is sure to be in the area, and it will become violently enraged.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Kangaskhan, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Kangaskhan, gShinyOverworldPalette_Kangaskhan )

By cleverly flicking the fins on its back side to side, it moves in any direction while facing forward. It spits ink to escape if it senses danger.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Horsea, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT, gOverworldPalette_Horsea, gShinyOverworldPalette_Horsea )

description: The poisonous barbs all over its body are highly valued as ingredients for making traditional herbal medicine. It shows no mercy to anything approaching its nest.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Seadra, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT, gOverworldPalette_Seadra, gShinyOverworldPalette_Seadra )

description: It sleeps quietly, deep on the seafloor. When it comes up to the surface, it creates a huge whirlpool that can swallow even ships.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Kingdra, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT, gOverworldPalette_Kingdra, gShinyOverworldPalette_Kingdra )

description: In the springtime, schools of Goldeen can be seen swimming up falls and rivers. It metes out staggering damage with its single horn.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_GoldeenF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT )

description: It punches holes in boulders on stream- beds. This is a clever innovation that prevents its eggs from being attacked or washed away by the current.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_SeakingF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT )

description: It gathers with others in the night and makes its red core glow on and off with the twinkling stars. It can regenerate limbs if they are severed from its body.

overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Starmie, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Starmie, gShinyOverworldPalette_Starmie )

overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_MimeJr, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_MimeJr, gShinyOverworldPalette_MimeJr )

description: A Mr. Mime is a master of pantomime. It can convince others that something unseeable actually exists. Once believed, the imaginary object does become real.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_MrMime, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_MrMime, gShinyOverworldPalette_MrMime )

description: Its talent is tap-dancing. It can radiate chilliness from the bottoms of its feet to to create a floor of ice, which this Pokémon can kick up to use as a barrier.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_MrMimeGalar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_MrMimeGalar, gShinyOverworldPalette_MrMimeGalar )

description: It's highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane of ice in time with its graceful movements.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_MrRime, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_MrRime, gShinyOverworldPalette_MrRime )

description: Its blindingly fast speed adds to the sharpness of its twin forearm scythes. The scythes can slice through thick logs in one wicked stroke.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_ScytherF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_ScizorF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: The excess energy that bathes this Pokémon keeps it in constant danger of overflow. It can't sustain a battle over long periods of time.
A violent creature that fells trees with its crude axes and shields itself with hard stone. Should one encounter this Pokémon in the wild, one's only recourse is to flee.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Kleavor, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Kleavor, gShinyOverworldPalette_Kleavor )

description: It actively runs about, but also falls often. Whenever it falls, it will check its reflection on a lake's surface to make sure its face hasn't become dirty.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Smoochum, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Smoochum, gShinyOverworldPalette_Smoochum )

description: A Jynx sashays rhythmically as if it were dancing. Its motions are so bouncingly alluring, people seeing it are compelled to shake their hips without noticing.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Jynx, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Jynx, gShinyOverworldPalette_Jynx )

overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Elekid, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Elekid, gShinyOverworldPalette_Elekid )
OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Electabuzz, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Electabuzz, gShinyOverworldPalette_Electabuzz )

description: When it gets excited, it thumps its chest. With every thud, thunder roars, electric sparks shower all around and blue sparks begin to crackle between its horns.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Electivire, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Electivire, gShinyOverworldPalette_Electivire )

description: If a Magby is spouting yellow flames from its mouth, it is in good health. When it is fatigued, black smoke will be mixed in with the flames.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Magby, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Magby, gShinyOverworldPalette_Magby )

description: In battle, it blows out intense flames from all over its body to intimidate its foe. These fiery bursts create heat waves that ignite grass and trees in the area.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Magmar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Magmar, gShinyOverworldPalette_Magmar )

description: According to what is known, a single pair of male and female Magmortar lives in one volcano. From its arm, it launches fireballs hotter than 3,600ºF.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Magmortar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Magmortar, gShinyOverworldPalette_Magmortar )

description: Their pincers are strong enough to shatter thick logs. Because they dislike cold, Pinsir burrow and sleep under the ground on chilly nights.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Pinsir, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Pinsir, gShinyOverworldPalette_Pinsir )

description: The influence of Mega Evolution leaves it in a state of constant excitement. It pierces enemies with its two large horns before shredding them.
It is not satisfied unless it is rampaging at all times. If there is no opponent for Tauros to battle, it will charge at thick trees and knock them down to calm itself.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Tauros, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Tauros, gShinyOverworldPalette_Tauros )

description: This Pokémon has a muscular body and excels at close-quarters combat. It uses its short horns to strike the opponent’s weak spots.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_TaurosPaldeaCombat, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_TaurosPaldeaCombat, gShinyOverworldPalette_TaurosPaldeaCombat )

description: When heated by fire energy, its horns can get hotter than 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit. Those gored by them will suffer both wounds and burns.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_TaurosPaldeaBlaze, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_TaurosPaldeaBlaze, gShinyOverworldPalette_TaurosPaldeaBlaze )

description: This Pokémon blasts water from holes on the tips of its horns--the high-pressure jets pierce right through Tauros’s enemies.

description: Its swimming muscles are weak, so it is easily washed away by currents. In places where water pools, you can see many Magikarp deposited there by the flow.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_MagikarpF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT )

description: It is an extremely vicious and violent Pokémon. When humans begin to fight, it will appear and burn everything to the ground with intensely hot flames.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_GyaradosF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SLITHER )

description: Although it obeys its instinctive drive to destroy everything within its reach, it will respond to orders from a Trainer it truly trusts.

overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Lapras, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SLITHER, gOverworldPalette_Lapras, gShinyOverworldPalette_Lapras )

A Ditto rearranges its cell structure to transform itself. However, if it tries to change based on its memory, it will get details wrong.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Ditto, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SLITHER, gOverworldPalette_Ditto, gShinyOverworldPalette_Ditto )
OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_EeveeF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: Having gotten even friendlier and more innocent, Eevee tries to play with anyone around, only to end up crushing them with its immense body.

overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Eevee, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Eevee, gShinyOverworldPalette_Eevee )

overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Vaporeon, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Vaporeon, gShinyOverworldPalette_Vaporeon )

overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Flareon, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Flareon, gShinyOverworldPalette_Flareon )

description: An Espeon is extremely loyal to any Trainer it considers to be worthy. It is said to have developed precognitive powers to protect its Trainer from harm.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Espeon, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Espeon, gShinyOverworldPalette_Espeon )

overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Porygon, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_Porygon, gShinyOverworldPalette_Porygon )

description: One of the ancient and long-since-extinct Pokémon that have been regenerated from fossils by humans. If attacked, it withdraws into its hard shell.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Omanyte, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_SPOT, gOverworldPalette_Omanyte, gShinyOverworldPalette_Omanyte )

description: An Omastar uses its tentacles to capture its prey. It is believed to have become extinct because its shell grew too large, making its movements slow and ponderous.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Omastar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Omastar, gShinyOverworldPalette_Omastar )

When it finds something that looks like it might be edible, it goes right ahead and swallows it whole. That's why it gets fatter day by day.

overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Snorlax, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Snorlax, gShinyOverworldPalette_Snorlax )

Articuno is a legendary bird Pokémon that can control ice. The flapping of its wings chills the air. As a result, it is said that when this Pokémon flies, snow will fall.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Articuno, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_Articuno, gShinyOverworldPalette_Articuno )
