overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Rayquaza, SIZE_64x64, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_Rayquaza, gShinyOverworldPalette_Rayquaza )

description: Particles stream from the filaments that extend from its jaw. They can control the density and humidity of the air, allowing Rayquaza to manipulate the weather.
Jirachi is said to make wishes come true. While it sleeps, a tough crystalline shell envelops the body to protect it from enemies.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Jirachi, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_Jirachi, gShinyOverworldPalette_Jirachi )
OVERWORLD( sPicTable_DeoxysNormal, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_DeoxysNormal, gShinyOverworldPalette_DeoxysNormal )
OVERWORLD( sPicTable_DeoxysAttack, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_DeoxysAttack, gShinyOverworldPalette_DeoxysAttack )
OVERWORLD( sPicTable_DeoxysDefense, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_DeoxysDefense, gShinyOverworldPalette_DeoxysDefense )
OVERWORLD( sPicTable_DeoxysSpeed, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_DeoxysSpeed, gShinyOverworldPalette_DeoxysSpeed )

description: The shell on its back is made of soil.  On a very healthy Turtwig, the shell  should feel moist. The leaf on its head wilts if it is thirsty.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Turtwig, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Turtwig, gShinyOverworldPalette_Turtwig )

description: A Grotle that lives in the forest is said to have its own secret springwater well.  It carries fellow Pokémon there on  its back.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Grotle, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Grotle, gShinyOverworldPalette_Grotle )

description: Some Pokémon are born on a Torterra's back and spend their entire life there. Ancient people imagined that beneath  the ground, a gigantic Torterra dwelled.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Torterra, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Torterra, gShinyOverworldPalette_Torterra )

description: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Before going to sleep, Chimchar extinguish the flame on their tails to prevent fires.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Chimchar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Chimchar, gShinyOverworldPalette_Chimchar )

description: It carefully controls the intensity of the flame on its tail, so as to keep its foes at an adequate distance. Its fiery tail is but one weapon.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Monferno, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Monferno, gShinyOverworldPalette_Monferno )

description: Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It uses a special kind of martial arts involving all of its limbs to take on any opponent.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Infernape, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Infernape, gShinyOverworldPalette_Infernape )

description: A poor walker, it often falls down. However, its strong pride makes it puff up its chest without a care. It's difficult to bond with since it won't listen to its Trainer.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Piplup, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Piplup, gShinyOverworldPalette_Piplup )

description: Because every Prinplup considers itself to be the most important, they can never form a group. It searches for prey in icy seas.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Prinplup, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Prinplup, gShinyOverworldPalette_Prinplup )

description: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. It avoids unnecessary disputes, but it will decimate anything that threatens its pride.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Empoleon, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Empoleon, gShinyOverworldPalette_Empoleon )

description: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. However, they bicker if the group grows too big. Their singing is noisy and annoying.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_StarlyF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: Recognizing their own weakness, they maintain huge flocks. Fierce scuffles break out between various flocks. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_StaraviaF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. It has a savage nature. It will courageously challenge foes that are much larger.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_StaraptorF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: A comparison revealed that Bidoof's front teeth grow at the same rate as Rattata's. It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_BidoofF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. A river dammed by Bibarel will never overflow its banks, which is appreciated by people nearby.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_BibarelF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: It shakes its head back to front, causing its antennae to hit each other and sound like a xylophone. These sounds are fall hallmarks.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_KricketotF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: It signals its emotions with its melodies. There is a village that hosts a contest based on the amazingly variable cries of this Pokémon.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_KricketuneF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: It rapidly contracts and relaxes its muscles to generate electricity. Its body shines if endangered. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_ShinxF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch has enough amperage to cause fainting in foes.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_LuxioF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: It has eyes which can see through anything. Luxray's ability to see through objects comes in handy when it's scouting for danger.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_LuxrayF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, its skull is as hard as iron.  It would snap obstructing trees with headbutts.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Cranidos, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Cranidos, gShinyOverworldPalette_Cranidos )

description: The result of repeated headbutts is a skull grown thick and hard. However, its brain has shrunk in size compared with Cranidos's.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Rampardos, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Rampardos, gShinyOverworldPalette_Rampardos )

description: This Pokémon lived in primeval jungles. Few enemies would have been willing to square off against its heavily armored face, so it's thought.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Shieldon, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Shieldon, gShinyOverworldPalette_Shieldon )

description: Their rock-hard faces serve to protect them from any frontral attacks. When attacked, they form a wall. They shielded their young in that way.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Bastiodon, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Bastiodon, gShinyOverworldPalette_Bastiodon )

description: If its cloak is even slightly damaged, it will immediately repair it with whatever is near at hand. The Pokémon within the cloak is scrawny and vulnerable to the cold.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_BurmyPlantCloak, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_BurmyPlantCloak, gShinyOverworldPalette_BurmyPlantCloak )

description: It weaves a cloak together with sand, mud, and silk it spits out. This earthen cloak is ruined by wind and rain, so the Pokémon hides away in caves and other such places.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_BurmySandy, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_BurmySandy, gShinyOverworldPalette_BurmySandy )

description: When confronted by a lack of other materials, Burmy will create its cloak using dust and refuse. The cloak seems to be more comfortable than one would think.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_BurmyTrash, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_BurmyTrash, gShinyOverworldPalette_BurmyTrash )

description: Its appearance changes depending on where Burmy evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body. The cloak is never shed.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_WormadamPlantCloak, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_WormadamPlantCloak, gShinyOverworldPalette_WormadamPlantCloak )

description: Its earthen skin is reasonably hard, it has no problem repelling a Starly's pecking. It is said that a Wormadam that evolves on a cold day will have a thicker cloak.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_WormadamSandy, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_WormadamSandy, gShinyOverworldPalette_WormadamSandy )

description: Its body, composed of refuse, blends in to the scenery enough to be inconspicuous. This seems to be the perfect way for it to evade the detection of predators.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_WormadamTrash, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_WormadamTrash, gShinyOverworldPalette_WormadamTrash )

description: A Pokémon formed by three others. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_CombeeF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding. There is only one in a colony.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Vespiquen, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Vespiquen, gShinyOverworldPalette_Vespiquen )

description: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_PachirisuF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: It inflates its flotation sac, keeping its face above water in order to watch for prey movement. It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_BuizelF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_FloatzelF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for evolution. Apparently, it is also very sweet and tasty. Pokémon like Starly and Taillow try to peck it off.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Cherubi, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Cherubi, gShinyOverworldPalette_Cherubi )

description: It's motionless, save for the occasional quiver. A rich array of Pokémon can be found gathered around it, drawn by the scent exuded from Cherrim's folded petals.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_CherrimOvercast, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_CherrimOvercast, gShinyOverworldPalette_CherrimOvercast )

description: Cherrim takes this form on sunny days. Its faint scent entices bug Pokémon to it. It immediately closes its petals and becomes immobile once the sun hides.
It oozes a purple fluid to deter enemies. While harmless, the fluid is awfully sticky. Apparently, there are more West Sea Shellos now than there were in the past.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_ShellosWestSea, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_ShellosWestSea, gShinyOverworldPalette_ShellosWestSea )

description: It's capable of spending a limited amount of time on land until their skin dries out. One theory suggests that living in cold seas causes Shellos to take on this form.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_ShellosEast, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_ShellosEast, gShinyOverworldPalette_ShellosEast )

description: It appears on shallow-water beaches to eat sand for nourishment. Should one Gastrodon encounter another of a different color, a fierce battle will ensue.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_GastrodonWestSea, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_GastrodonWestSea, gShinyOverworldPalette_GastrodonWestSea )

description: Found more often on land than in the sea. They normally live in rocky seashores, but when cloudy or rainy, they can sometimes be found on mountains, far from the sea.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_GastrodonEast, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_GastrodonEast, gShinyOverworldPalette_GastrodonEast )

description: Because of the way it floats aimlessly, an old folktale calls it a “Signpost for Wandering Spirits.” Children holding them sometimes vanish.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Drifloon, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Drifloon, gShinyOverworldPalette_Drifloon )

description: Even while under careful observation, large flocks of Drifblim flying at dusk will inexplicably disappear from view. No one knows where they go.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Drifblim, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Drifblim, gShinyOverworldPalette_Drifblim )

description: You can tell how it feels by the way it rolls its ears. When it's scared, both ears are rolled up. When it senses danger, it perks them up.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Buneary, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Buneary, gShinyOverworldPalette_Buneary )

description: An extremely cautious Pokémon. It is very conscious of its looks and never fails to groom its ears. It runs with sprightly jumps.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Lopunny, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Lopunny, gShinyOverworldPalette_Lopunny )

description: Mega Evolution awakens its combative instincts. It has shed any fur that got in the way of its attacks. crescent.
It is a very fickle Pokémon, which is  very popular among some. It claws its Trainer's nose if it isn't fed and purrs when affectionate.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Glameow, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Glameow, gShinyOverworldPalette_Glameow )

description: It is a brazen brute that barges its way into another Pokémon's nest and claims it as its own. It binds its body with its tails to make itself look bigger.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Purugly, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Purugly, gShinyOverworldPalette_Purugly )

description: It protects itself by spraying a nose-curling, stinky fluid from its rear to repel attackers. The stench lingers for 24 hours.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Stunky, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Stunky, gShinyOverworldPalette_Stunky )

description: It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly fluid from the tip of its tail. The fluid smells worse the longer it is allowed to fester.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Skuntank, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Skuntank, gShinyOverworldPalette_Skuntank )

description: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. There are researchers who believe this Pokémon reflected like a mirror in the distant past.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Bronzor, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Bronzor, gShinyOverworldPalette_Bronzor )

description: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. One caused a news stir when it was dug up at a construction site after a 2000-year sleep.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Bronzong, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Bronzong, gShinyOverworldPalette_Bronzong )

description: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it. It can also learn and speak human words.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Chatot, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Chatot, gShinyOverworldPalette_Chatot )

description: A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Spiritomb, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Spiritomb, gShinyOverworldPalette_Spiritomb )

description: It nests in horizontal holes warmed by geothermal heat. Foes who stray too close can expect to be pounced on and bitten.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_GibleF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: Shiny objects are its passion. It can be found in its cave, scarcely moving, its gaze fixed on the jewels it's amassed or Carbink it has caught.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_GabiteF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It is covered in fine scales that reduce drag, enabling it to fly at high speeds.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_GarchompF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: Excess energy melted its arms and wings into giant scythes, sending it mad with rage. It swings its scythes wildly and slices the ground to pieces.
It can discern the physical and emotional states of people, Pokémon, and other natural things from the shape of their aura waves.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Riolu, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Riolu, gShinyOverworldPalette_Riolu )

description: It understands human speech. It is said that no foe can remain invisible to Lucario, since it can detect Auras. Even foes it could not otherwise see.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Lucario, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Lucario, gShinyOverworldPalette_Lucario )

description: It readies itself to face its enemies by focusing its mental energies. Its fighting style can be summed up in a single word: heartless.
Hippopotas shuts its nostrils tight when travelling through sand. Instead of perspiration, it expels grains of sand from its body.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_HippopotasF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: It is surprisingly quick to anger. It brandishes its gaping mouth in a display of fearsome strength and raises vast quantities of sand while attacking.
overworld: OVERWORLD_PAL_FEMALE( gOverworldPalette_HippowdonF, gShinyOverworldPalette_HippowdonF )

description: It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison. It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes. It can survive a year without food.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Skorupi, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Skorupi, gShinyOverworldPalette_Skorupi )

description: Possessing a sturdy build, it takes pride in its strength. It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap out of a car.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Drapion, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Drapion, gShinyOverworldPalette_Drapion )

description: Croagunk rarely fights fairly. Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_CroagunkF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: Swaying and dodging the attacks of its foes, it weaves its flexible body in close, then lunges out with its poisonous claws.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_ToxicroakF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: Hanging from branches using its tentacles, it looks like a plant. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Carnivine, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Carnivine, gShinyOverworldPalette_Carnivine )

description: Its double tail fins propel its energetic jumps. When it breaks the surface of the sea, Wingull swoop down to grab it on the fly.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_FinneonF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: Lumineon swimming in the darkness of the deep sea look like stars shining in the night sky. It competes for food with Lanturn.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_LumineonF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain's lower reaches. Seemingly curious about people, they gather around footsteps they find on snowy mountains.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_SnoverF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards. It is also known as “The Ice Monster.”
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_AbomasnowF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT )

description: The sprouts on Abomasnow's back grow into great shafts of ice when it Mega Evolves. Dislikes associating with others and chooses to live quietly deep in mountains.

overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Rotom, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Rotom, gShinyOverworldPalette_Rotom )

description: If the convection microwave oven is not working properly, then the Rotom inhabiting it will become lethargic. It makes mischief by turning up the heat.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_RotomHeat, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_RotomHeat, gShinyOverworldPalette_RotomHeat )

description: It enjoys coming up with water-based pranks. The model of washing machine that Rotom can inspirit has been discontinued, so they are now traded at high prices.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_RotomWash, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_RotomWash, gShinyOverworldPalette_RotomWash )

description: In this form, Rotom likes to play freezing cold pranks. You may find it's turned the bath you just filled to solid ice! It battles by spewing cold air.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_RotomFrost, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_RotomFrost, gShinyOverworldPalette_RotomFrost )

description: The first appliance developed that Rotom coud inspirit was the electric fan. It uses its power over wind in its pranks, happily blowing any important documents it finds.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_RotomFan, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_RotomFan, gShinyOverworldPalette_RotomFan )

description: The lawn mower is an appliance that led to the development of the Rotom Dex. It will mow down grass and flowers, then swagger around with pride at its accomplishments.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_RotomMow, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_RotomMow, gShinyOverworldPalette_RotomMow )

description: Known as ”The Being of Knowledge,” according to some sources, this Pokémon provided people with the intelligence necessary to solve various problems.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Uxie, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Uxie, gShinyOverworldPalette_Uxie )

description: Although it slumbers at the bottom of a lake, its spirit is said to leave its body and flitter on the water surface. It taught humans of sorrow, pain, and joy.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Mesprit, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Mesprit, gShinyOverworldPalette_Mesprit )

description: This Pokémon is said to have endowed humans with the determination needed to do things. It is thought that Uxie, Mesprit and Azelf all came from the same egg.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Azelf, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Azelf, gShinyOverworldPalette_Azelf )

description: A Pokémon spoken of in legend. It completely controls the flow of time. It uses its power to travel at will through the past and future.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Dialga, SIZE_64x64, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Dialga, gShinyOverworldPalette_Dialga )

description: Radiant light caused Dialga to take on a form bearing a striking resemblance to the creator Pokémon. It wields such a colossal strength that this might be its true form.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_DialgaOrigin, SIZE_64x64, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_DialgaOrigin, gShinyOverworldPalette_DialgaOrigin )

description: Palkia has the ability to distort space. Its total control over the boundaries of space enable it to transport itself to faraway places and other dimensions.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Palkia, SIZE_64x64, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Palkia, gShinyOverworldPalette_Palkia )

description: It soars across the sky in a form that resembles the creator of all things. Perhaps this imitation of appearance is a strategy for gaining Arceus's powers.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_PalkiaOrigin, SIZE_64x64, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_PalkiaOrigin, gShinyOverworldPalette_PalkiaOrigin )

description: Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its body. It dwells in volcanic caves, using its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Heatran, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Heatran, gShinyOverworldPalette_Heatran )

description: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokémon shaped Regirock, Regice, and Registeel out of clay, ice, and magma.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Regigigas, SIZE_64x64, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Regigigas, gShinyOverworldPalette_Regigigas )

description: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange. It was banished for its violence.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_GiratinaAltered, SIZE_64x64, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_GiratinaAltered, gShinyOverworldPalette_GiratinaAltered )

description: Giratina loses its legs upon changing into this form. It's believed it hails from a world where the heavens and the earth are as one.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_GiratinaOrigin, SIZE_64x64, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_GiratinaOrigin, gShinyOverworldPalette_GiratinaOrigin )

description: Those who sleep holding one of Cresselia's feathers are assured of joyful dreams. It is said to represent the crescent moon.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Cresselia, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Cresselia, gShinyOverworldPalette_Cresselia )

description: When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac on their heads and drift languidly on the sea in packs. It always returns to where it was born.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Phione, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Phione, gShinyOverworldPalette_Phione )

description: Water makes up 80% of its body. It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits it to bond with any kind of Pokémon.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Manaphy, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Manaphy, gShinyOverworldPalette_Manaphy )

description: It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers. However, it means no harm.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Darkrai, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Darkrai, gShinyOverworldPalette_Darkrai )

description: The flowers all over its body bloom if it is lovingly hugged and senses gratitude. It dissolves toxins in the air to transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_ShayminLand, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_ShayminLand, gShinyOverworldPalette_ShayminLand )

description: Upon taking in the scent of a particular rare flower, Shaymin is enveloped in light and its tiny body transforms, confering the power of flight upon it.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_ShayminSky, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_ShayminSky, gShinyOverworldPalette_ShayminSky )

description: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Victini, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Victini, gShinyOverworldPalette_Victini )

description: It is very intelligent and calm. Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes its movements swifter. When they are not feeling well, their tails droop.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Snivy, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Snivy, gShinyOverworldPalette_Snivy )

description: When it gets dirty, its leaves can't be used in photosynthesis, so it always keeps clean. They avoid attacks by sinking into the shadows of thick foliage.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Servine, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Servine, gShinyOverworldPalette_Servine )

description: They raise their heads to intimidate foes, but only give it their all when fighting powerful opponents who are not fazed by the glare from its noble eyes.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Serperior, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Serperior, gShinyOverworldPalette_Serperior )

description: It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it gets too excited and burns them to a crisp. It blows fire through its nose.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Tepig, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Tepig, gShinyOverworldPalette_Tepig )

description: The more it eats, the more fuel it has to make the fire in its stomach stronger. When it is angered, the intensity of the flame increases.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Pignite, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Pignite, gShinyOverworldPalette_Pignite )

description: It is adept at using many different moves. It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Emboar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Emboar, gShinyOverworldPalette_Emboar )

description: The scalchop on its stomach isn't just used for battle, it can be used to break open hard berries as well. It is made from the same element as its claws.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Oshawott, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Oshawott, gShinyOverworldPalette_Oshawott )

description: Strict training and disclipine leads it to master its flowing double-scalchop technique. Scalchop techniques differ from one Dewott to another.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Dewott, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Dewott, gShinyOverworldPalette_Dewott )

description: One swing of the seamitars attached to its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them is enough to intimidate most enemies.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Samurott, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Samurott, gShinyOverworldPalette_Samurott )

description: Hard of heart and deft of blade, this rare form of Samurott is a product of the Pokémon's evolution in the region of Hisui.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_SamurottHisui, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_SamurottHisui, gShinyOverworldPalette_SamurottHisui )

description: Extremely cautious, they take shifts to maintain a constant watch of their nest. Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Patrat, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Patrat, gShinyOverworldPalette_Patrat )

description: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents. Keen eyesight lets them see in the dark.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Watchog, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Watchog, gShinyOverworldPalette_Watchog )

description: It faces strong opponents with great courage. Because it doesn't yelp, it's extremely popular with Trainers who live in apartment buildings.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Lillipup, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Lillipup, gShinyOverworldPalette_Lillipup )

description: Its dense black fur grows continuously. The high cost of keeping its hard fur properly groomed makes this a troublesome Pokémon to train.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Herdier, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Herdier, gShinyOverworldPalette_Herdier )

description: Intelligent, good-natured, and valiant, there could be no concern that it would ever attack people. Some parents even trust it to babysit.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Stoutland, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Stoutland, gShinyOverworldPalette_Stoutland )

description: Their deceptively cute act is the perfect ruse. They steal from people for fun, but their victims can't help but forgive them.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Purrloin, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Purrloin, gShinyOverworldPalette_Purrloin )

description: Many Trainers are drawn to their beautiful form and fur. These Pokémon vanish and appear unexpectedly. They run silently in the night.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Liepard, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Liepard, gShinyOverworldPalette_Liepard )

description: This Pokémon dwells deep in the forest. It's good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It's kind enough to share them with friends.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Pansage, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Pansage, gShinyOverworldPalette_Pansage )

description: Ill tempered, it attacks enemies by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Simisage, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Simisage, gShinyOverworldPalette_Simisage )

description: The fire within the tuft on its head can reach up to 600ºF. Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Pansear, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Pansear, gShinyOverworldPalette_Pansear )

description: It loves sweets because they become energy for the fire burning inside its body. It scatters embers from its head and tail to sear its opponents.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Simisear, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Simisear, gShinyOverworldPalette_Simisear )

description: The water stored inside the tuft of its head is rich in nutrients. It waters plants using its tail, plants that receive its water grow large.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Panpour, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Panpour, gShinyOverworldPalette_Panpour )

description: It can shoot highly-pressurised water from its tail with enough power to break through a solid concrete wall. It prefers places with clean water.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Simipour, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Simipour, gShinyOverworldPalette_Simipour )

description: This Pokémon appears before people and Pokémon who are having nightmares and eats those dreams. Munna always float in the air.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Munna, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Munna, gShinyOverworldPalette_Munna )

description: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon. It changes into different colors depending on the dream that was eaten.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Musharna, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Musharna, gShinyOverworldPalette_Musharna )

description: This very forgetful Pokémon will wait for a new order from its Trainer even though it already has one. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Pidove, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Pidove, gShinyOverworldPalette_Pidove )

description: No matter where in the world it goes, it knows where its nest is, so it can always return to its Trainer's location regardless of the distance.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Tranquill, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Tranquill, gShinyOverworldPalette_Tranquill )
OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_UnfezantF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_UnfezantF, gShinyOverworldPalette_UnfezantF )

description: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate with one another.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Blitzle, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Blitzle, gShinyOverworldPalette_Blitzle )

description: When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates. It is dangerous when it's angry as it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Zebstrika, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Zebstrika, gShinyOverworldPalette_Zebstrika )

description: The hexagonal cavity is its ear. It walks in the direction of sounds it hears, but if the sounds cease, it panics and topples over.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Roggenrola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Roggenrola, gShinyOverworldPalette_Roggenrola )

description: Its orange crystal is a mass of energy. Just one crystal fragment would provide enough fuel for a hundred dump trucks. When it is healthy, its core sticks out.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Boldore, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Boldore, gShinyOverworldPalette_Boldore )

description: The blasts of energy it makes from sunbeams have terrifying power. However, it's not able to fire its blasts at night or on rainy days.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Gigalith, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Gigalith, gShinyOverworldPalette_Gigalith )

description: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. Suction from its nostrils enables it to stick to cave walls during sleep. It leaves a heart-shaped mark behind.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Woobat, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Woobat, gShinyOverworldPalette_Woobat )

description: Anyone who comes into contact with the ultrasonic waves emitted by a courting male experiences a positive mood shift.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Swoobat, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Swoobat, gShinyOverworldPalette_Swoobat )

description: It can dig through the ground at a speed of 30 mph by spinning its body. It could give a car running aboveground a good race.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Drilbur, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Drilbur, gShinyOverworldPalette_Drilbur )

description: More than 300 feet below the surface, they build mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to subway tunnels, but it can also help with construction.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Excadrill, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Excadrill, gShinyOverworldPalette_Excadrill )

description: Its auditory sense is astounding. Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Audino, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Audino, gShinyOverworldPalette_Audino )

description: Mega Audino emits a soothing pulse from its body that reduces hostility in others. Anything that comes into contact with its second feelers will fall into a deep sleep.
These Pokémon appear at building sites and help out with construction. They always carry squared logs. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Timburr, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Timburr, gShinyOverworldPalette_Timburr )

description: They strengthen their bodies by carrying steel beams. This Pokémon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Gurdurr, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Gurdurr, gShinyOverworldPalette_Gurdurr )

description: They use concrete pillars as walking canes. Rather than rely solely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.

description: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans. It uses the rhythm of these sounds to talk and warns others of danger.

overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Palpitoad, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Palpitoad, gShinyOverworldPalette_Palpitoad )

description: It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists. They can also shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Seismitoad, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Seismitoad, gShinyOverworldPalette_Seismitoad )

overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Throh, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Throh, gShinyOverworldPalette_Throh )

description: The sound of Sawk punching boulders and trees can be heard all the way from the mountains where they train. Disturbing their training angers them.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Sawk, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Sawk, gShinyOverworldPalette_Sawk )

overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Venipede, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Venipede, gShinyOverworldPalette_Venipede )

description: Storing energy for evolution, it sits. But when attacked, it spins its body at high speed like a wheel and then crashes furiously into its opponent.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Whirlipede, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Whirlipede, gShinyOverworldPalette_Whirlipede )

description: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails. Then it finishes them off with deadly poison.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Scolipede, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Scolipede, gShinyOverworldPalette_Scolipede )

overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Lilligant, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Lilligant, gShinyOverworldPalette_Lilligant )

description: Its well-developed legs are the result of a life spent on mountains covered in deep snow. The scent it exudes from its flower crown heartens those in proximity.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_LilligantHisui, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_LilligantHisui, gShinyOverworldPalette_LilligantHisui )

description: It used to be a common food source. The meat of red Basculin is on the fatty side and it's more popular with the youth. Its temperament is vicious and aggressive.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_BasculinRedStriped, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_BasculinRedStriped, gShinyOverworldPalette_BasculinRedStriped )

description: They form schools with others of the same color. The greatest foe of a school of blue Basculin is a school of red Basculin. Its flavor is light and inoffensive.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_BasculinBlueStriped, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_BasculinBlueStriped, gShinyOverworldPalette_BasculinBlueStriped )

description: While this ancient form of Basculin shares a vast array of qualities with other forms, it differs in several respects, including demeanor, being much gentler than others.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_BasculinWhiteStriped, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_BasculinWhiteStriped, gShinyOverworldPalette_BasculinWhiteStriped )

description: Clads itself in the souls of comrades that perished before fulfilling their goals of journeying upstream. No other species in all Hisui's rivers is Basculegion's equal.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_BasculegionM, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_BasculegionM, gShinyOverworldPalette_BasculegionM )

description: The souls of its comrades cloak its body and propel it effortlessly through even raging rapids.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_BasculegionF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_BasculegionF, gShinyOverworldPalette_BasculegionF )

description: It conceals itself in the sand and chomps down on the legs of any prey that unwarily walk over it. Its favorite food is Trapinch.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Sandile, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Sandile, gShinyOverworldPalette_Sandile )

description: They move in groups of a few individuals. Thanks to the special membrane covering its eyes, it can see its surroundings clearly, even in the dead of night.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Krokorok, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Krokorok, gShinyOverworldPalette_Krokorok )

description: Very violent Pokémon, they never allow their prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Krookodile, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Krookodile, gShinyOverworldPalette_Krookodile )

description: When its internal fire is burning, it cannot calm down and it runs around. When the fire diminishes, it pulls its limbs into its body and falls asleep.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Darumaka, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Darumaka, gShinyOverworldPalette_Darumaka )

description: When one is injured in a fierce battle, it transforms into a stone statue. Then it meditates and sharpens its mind and fights on mentally.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_DarmanitanStandard, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_DarmanitanStandard, gShinyOverworldPalette_DarmanitanStandard )

description: When wounded, it stops moving. It goes as still as stone to meditate, sharpening its mind and spirit.
The colder they get, the more energetic they are. They freeze their breath to make snowballs, using them as ammo for playful snowball fights.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_DarumakaGalar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_DarumakaGalar, gShinyOverworldPalette_DarumakaGalar )

description: On days when blizzards blow through, it comes down to where people live. It stashes food in the snowball on its head, taking it home for later.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_DarmanitanGalarStandard, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_DarmanitanGalarStandard, gShinyOverworldPalette_DarmanitanGalarStandard )

description: Darmanitan takes this form when enraged. It won't stop spewing flames until its rage has settled, even if its body starts to melt.
Arid regions are their habitat. When it moves rhythmically, it makes a sound similar to maracas, making the surprised Pokémon flee.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Maractus, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Maractus, gShinyOverworldPalette_Maractus )

description: It makes a hole in a stone of a suitable size. If that rock breaks, the Pokémon remains agitated until it locates a replacement.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Dwebble, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Dwebble, gShinyOverworldPalette_Dwebble )

description: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle and begins to weaken.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Crustle, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Crustle, gShinyOverworldPalette_Crustle )

description: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck. Its skull is massively thick.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Scraggy, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Scraggy, gShinyOverworldPalette_Scraggy )

description: Groups of them beat up anything that enters their territory. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader, and is the most respected.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Scrafty, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Scrafty, gShinyOverworldPalette_Scrafty )

description: The guardians of an ancient city, they always fly the same route while keeping watch for invaders. They use their psychic power to attack enemies.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Sigilyph, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Sigilyph, gShinyOverworldPalette_Sigilyph )

description: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves in past ages. Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Yamask, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Yamask, gShinyOverworldPalette_Yamask )

description: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies. Their bodies are covered in pure gold.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Cofagrigus, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Cofagrigus, gShinyOverworldPalette_Cofagrigus )

description: A clay slab with cursed engravings took possession of a Yamask. The slab is said to be absorbing the Yamask's dark power.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_YamaskGalar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_YamaskGalar, gShinyOverworldPalette_YamaskGalar )

description: A powerful curse was woven into an ancient painting. After absorbing the spirit of a Yamask, the painting began to move.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Runerigus, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Runerigus, gShinyOverworldPalette_Runerigus )

description: Reputed to be the ancestor of most turtle Pokémon, it lived in warm seas about a hundred million years ago. It was restored from a fossil.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Tirtouga, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Tirtouga, gShinyOverworldPalette_Tirtouga )

description: They can live both in the ocean and on land. Incredible jaw strength enables them to chew up steel beams and rocks along with their prey.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Carracosta, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Carracosta, gShinyOverworldPalette_Carracosta )

description: Said to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon, Archen itself could not actually fly but moved by hopping from treetop to treetop.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Archen, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Archen, gShinyOverworldPalette_Archen )

description: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. When one Archeops had the prey cornered, another would swoop on it.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Archeops, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Archeops, gShinyOverworldPalette_Archeops )

description: It gorges on trash until its stomach is full. Then it belches toxic gas. An unlucky whiff of this gas will put a person in the hospital.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Trubbish, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Trubbish, gShinyOverworldPalette_Trubbish )

description: Beware the poisonous liquid it shoots from its right arm. If even a little of it gets on you, you'll experience the full effects of this unidentified toxin.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Garbodor, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Garbodor, gShinyOverworldPalette_Garbodor )

description: It sprays toxic gas from its mouth and fingers. If the gas engulfs you, the toxins will seep in all the way down to your bones.
To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon. Apparently, it often transforms into a silent child.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Zorua, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Zorua, gShinyOverworldPalette_Zorua )

description: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents. They defend their lair with illusory scenery.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Zoroark, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Zoroark, gShinyOverworldPalette_Zoroark )

description: Derives power from resentment, which rises as energy atop its head and takes on the forms of foes. In this way, Zorua vents lingering malice.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_ZoruaHisui, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_ZoruaHisui, gShinyOverworldPalette_ZoruaHisui )

description: Heedless of its own safety, Zoroark attacks its nemeses with a bitter energy so intense, it lacerates Zoroark's own body.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_ZoroarkHisui, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_ZoroarkHisui, gShinyOverworldPalette_ZoroarkHisui )

description: These Pokémon prefer a tidy habitat. They greet one another by rubbing each other with their tails, which are always kept well groomed and clean.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Minccino, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Minccino, gShinyOverworldPalette_Minccino )

description: Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Cinccino's body is coated in a special oil that repels dust and helps it deflect attacks, such as punches.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Cinccino, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Cinccino, gShinyOverworldPalette_Cinccino )

description: They intently observe both Trainers and Pokémon. Apparently, Gothita are looking at something that only they can see. Their ribbonlike feelers increase their power.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Gothita, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Gothita, gShinyOverworldPalette_Gothita )

description: Starlight is the source of their power. They use hypnosis to control people and Pokémon. Tales of Gothorita leading them astray are told in every corner.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Gothorita, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Gothorita, gShinyOverworldPalette_Gothorita )

description: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power. When it learns its Trainer's life span, it cries in sadness.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Gothitelle, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Gothitelle, gShinyOverworldPalette_Gothitelle )

description: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe. They can use telepathy to talk with others.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Solosis, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Solosis, gShinyOverworldPalette_Solosis )

description: When their brains, now divided in two, are thinking the same thoughts, these Pokémon exhibit their maximized psychic power.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Duosion, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Duosion, gShinyOverworldPalette_Duosion )

description: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Reuniclus, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Reuniclus, gShinyOverworldPalette_Reuniclus )

description: These bird Pokémon are excellent divers. They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Ducklett, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Ducklett, gShinyOverworldPalette_Ducklett )

description: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles. The one in the middle is the leader of the flock.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Swanna, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Swanna, gShinyOverworldPalette_Swanna )

description: The temperature of their breath is -58ºF. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them. Vanillite is treasured by households in warm regions.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Vanillite, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Vanillite, gShinyOverworldPalette_Vanillite )

description: Vanillish has existed since the Ice Age. It controls particles of ice, freezes its opponents, and then shatters them with a headbutt.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Vanillish, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Vanillish, gShinyOverworldPalette_Vanillish )

description: Each of its two heads has a brain, and when they are in agreement, it attacks its enemies by exhaling a violent blizzard. It makes snow clouds inside its body.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Vanilluxe, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Vanilluxe, gShinyOverworldPalette_Vanilluxe )

description: Deerling have different scents depending on the season. In early spring, these Pokémon give off a delicate, sweet, and calming scent.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_DeerlingSpring, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_DeerlingSpring, gShinyOverworldPalette_DeerlingSpring )

description: To prevent Deerling from entering their fields, many farmers will have several Lycanroc stand guard, as they are its natural enemy.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_DeerlingSummer, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_DeerlingSummer, gShinyOverworldPalette_DeerlingSummer )

description: Deerling have different scents depending on the season. In this form, Deerling have a softly sweet scent that lingers in the nose.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_DeerlingAutumn, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_DeerlingAutumn, gShinyOverworldPalette_DeerlingAutumn )

description: Deerling's scent changes with the seasons, but when the Pokémon is in its Winter Form, it has hardly any scent at all.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_DeerlingWinter, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_DeerlingWinter, gShinyOverworldPalette_DeerlingWinter )

description: Some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring because the plants growing on its horns change according to the season. The leader possesses magnificent horns.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_SawsbuckSpring, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_SawsbuckSpring, gShinyOverworldPalette_SawsbuckSpring )

description: The thicker and larger the branches and leaves on its antlers, the more majestic the Sawsbuck is thought to be.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_SawsbuckSummer, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_SawsbuckSummer, gShinyOverworldPalette_SawsbuckSummer )

description: Sawsbuck in their Autumn Form are known for having very short tempers. The males fight each other incessantly.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_SawsbuckAutumn, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_SawsbuckAutumn, gShinyOverworldPalette_SawsbuckAutumn )

description: Though there are many enthusiasts for Sawsbuck as a species, this seasonal form in particular is not very popular.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_SawsbuckWinter, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_SawsbuckWinter, gShinyOverworldPalette_SawsbuckWinter )

description: It glides using its cape-like membrane. It grills berries and bug Pokémon with electric shocks from the pouches on its cheeks and makes a meal of them.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Emolga, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Emolga, gShinyOverworldPalette_Emolga )

description: When they feel threatened, they spit an acidic liquid to drive attackers away. For some reason they evolve while they are in the same place as Shelmet.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Karrablast, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Karrablast, gShinyOverworldPalette_Karrablast )

description: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances. The steel armor protects their whole body.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Escavalier, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Escavalier, gShinyOverworldPalette_Escavalier )

description: It lures Pokémon in with its pattern that looks just like a Poké Ball, then releases its poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Foongus, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Foongus, gShinyOverworldPalette_Foongus )

description: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a swaying motion, but very few Pokémon are fooled by this.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Amoonguss, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Amoonguss, gShinyOverworldPalette_Amoonguss )

description: If its veil-like arms stun and wrap an opponent, that foe will be dragged five miles below the surface to its lair, never to return.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_FrillishF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_FrillishF, gShinyOverworldPalette_FrillishF )

description: They propel themselves by expelling absorbed seawater from their bodies. It's said there's a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.
overworld: OVERWORLD_FEMALE( sPicTable_JellicentF, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_JellicentF, gShinyOverworldPalette_JellicentF )

description: When they find a wounded Pokémon, they embrace it and bring it to shore. The special membrane enveloping Alomomola has the ability to heal wounds.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Alomomola, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Alomomola, gShinyOverworldPalette_Alomomola )

description: Since they can't generate their own electricity, they attach themselves to large-bodied Pokémon and absorb static electricity, which they store in a pouch.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Joltik, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Joltik, gShinyOverworldPalette_Joltik )

description: It creates barriers from electrified silk that stun foes. This works as a weapon as well as a defense. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Galvantula, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Galvantula, gShinyOverworldPalette_Galvantula )

description: It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging to the ceiling of caves. When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Ferroseed, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Ferroseed, gShinyOverworldPalette_Ferroseed )

description: It fights by swinging around its three spiky feelers and shooting spikes. A hit from these steel spikes can reduce a boulder to rubble.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Ferrothorn, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Ferrothorn, gShinyOverworldPalette_Ferrothorn )

description: Two bodies comprise a fixed pair. The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Klink, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Klink, gShinyOverworldPalette_Klink )

description: A minigear and big gear comprise its body. Spinning minigears are rotated at high speed and repeatedly fired away. It is dangerous if the gears don't return.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Klang, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Klang, gShinyOverworldPalette_Klang )

description: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Klinklang, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Klinklang, gShinyOverworldPalette_Klinklang )

description: These Pokémon move in schools. One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Tynamo, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Tynamo, gShinyOverworldPalette_Tynamo )

description: These Pokémon have a big appetite. It wraps itself around its prey and paralyzes it with electricity from the round spots on its sides. Then it chomps.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Eelektrik, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Eelektrik, gShinyOverworldPalette_Eelektrik )

description: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean, with their sucker mouths.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Eelektross, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Eelektross, gShinyOverworldPalette_Eelektross )

description: It psychically squeezes the brain of its foe, causing unendurable headaches. Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Elgyem, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Elgyem, gShinyOverworldPalette_Elgyem )

description: It can manipulate an opponent's memory. Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three fingers, but those patterns haven't been decoded.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Beheeyem, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Beheeyem, gShinyOverworldPalette_Beheeyem )

description: While Litwick shines a light and pretends to be a guide, it absorbs the life force of any who follow it, which becomes the fuel that it burns.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Litwick, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Litwick, gShinyOverworldPalette_Litwick )

description: This ominous Pokémon is feared. Through cities it wanders, searching for the spirits of the fallen. The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Lampent, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Lampent, gShinyOverworldPalette_Lampent )

description: Being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind. By waving the flames on its arms, it puts its foes into a hypnotic trance.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Chandelure, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Chandelure, gShinyOverworldPalette_Chandelure )

description: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly, harder and sturdier than the last.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Axew, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Axew, gShinyOverworldPalette_Axew )

description: Their tusks can shatter rocks. A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Fraxure, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Fraxure, gShinyOverworldPalette_Fraxure )

description: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Haxorus, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Haxorus, gShinyOverworldPalette_Haxorus )

description: Its nose is always running. Their snot is a barometer of health. When healthy, their snot is sticky and the power of their ice moves increases.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Cubchoo, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Cubchoo, gShinyOverworldPalette_Cubchoo )

description: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Very able in the water, it swims around in northern seas and catches prey.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Beartic, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Beartic, gShinyOverworldPalette_Beartic )

description: They are born in snow clouds. When its body temperature goes up, it turns into steam and vanishes. When its temperature lowers, it returns to ice.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Cryogonal, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Cryogonal, gShinyOverworldPalette_Cryogonal )

description: When attacked, it defends itself by closing the lid of its shell. It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Shelmet, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Shelmet, gShinyOverworldPalette_Shelmet )

description: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in layers of thin membrane. It is very light and fights with ninja-like movements.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Accelgor, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Accelgor, gShinyOverworldPalette_Accelgor )

description: It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt of electricity. It smiles when transmitting electricity.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Stunfisk, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Stunfisk, gShinyOverworldPalette_Stunfisk )

description: Its conspicuous lips lure prey in as it lies in wait in the mud. When prey gets close, Stunfisk clamps its jagged steel fins down on them.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_StunfiskGalar, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_StunfiskGalar, gShinyOverworldPalette_StunfiskGalar )

description: They have mastered elegant combos. As they concentrate, their battle moves become swifter and more precise. What it lacks in power, it makes up for in quantity.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Mienfoo, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Mienfoo, gShinyOverworldPalette_Mienfoo )

description: They use the long fur on their arms as a whip to strike their opponents. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Mienshao, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Mienshao, gShinyOverworldPalette_Mienshao )

description: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move. It uses its sharp claws to catch prey.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Druddigon, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Druddigon, gShinyOverworldPalette_Druddigon )

description: These Pokémon are thought to have been created by the science of an ancient and mysterious civilization. It's been active for thousands of years.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Golett, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Golett, gShinyOverworldPalette_Golett )

description: Golurk were created to protect people and Pokémon by an ancient civilisation. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Golurk, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Golurk, gShinyOverworldPalette_Golurk )

description: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey. If battling dulls them, it sharpens them on stones by the river.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Pawniard, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Pawniard, gShinyOverworldPalette_Pawniard )

description: This pitiless Pokémon commands a group of Pawniard to hound prey into immobility. It battles to become the boss, but will be driven from the group if it loses.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Bisharp, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Bisharp, gShinyOverworldPalette_Bisharp )

description: Though it commands a massive army in battle, it's not skilled at devising complex strategies. It just uses brute strength to keep pushing.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Kingambit, SIZE_64x64, SHADOW_SIZE_L, TRACKS_NONE, gOverworldPalette_Kingambit, gShinyOverworldPalette_Kingambit )

description: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt. Their headbutts have enough destructive force to derail a train.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Bouffalant, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Bouffalant, gShinyOverworldPalette_Bouffalant )

description: With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierces its prey, and then it pecks at them. Although it also consumes berries, it's a carnivore at heart.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Rufflet, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Rufflet, gShinyOverworldPalette_Rufflet )

description: For the sake of its friends, this brave warrior of the sky will not stop battling, even if it is injured. One can carry a car while flying.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Braviary, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Braviary, gShinyOverworldPalette_Braviary )

description: Screaming a bloodcurdling battle cry, this huge and ferocious bird Pokémon goes out on the hunt.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_BraviaryHisui, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_BraviaryHisui, gShinyOverworldPalette_BraviaryHisui )

description: It can't fly yet and must wait until its wings have developed more. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Vullaby, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Vullaby, gShinyOverworldPalette_Vullaby )

description: They adorn themselves beautifully with bones. This is supposedly an effort to attract males, but no male Mandibuzz have ever been found.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Mandibuzz, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Mandibuzz, gShinyOverworldPalette_Mandibuzz )

description: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. They burn through Durant's steel bodies and consume their insides.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Heatmor, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Heatmor, gShinyOverworldPalette_Heatmor )

description: Durant dig nests in mountains. Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Durant, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Durant, gShinyOverworldPalette_Durant )

description: Lacking sight, it's unaware of its surroundings, so it bumps into things and eats anything that moves. Approaching it carelessly is dangerous.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Deino, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Deino, gShinyOverworldPalette_Deino )

description: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves on to another area. Whichever head eats more than the other gets to be the leader.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Zweilous, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Zweilous, gShinyOverworldPalette_Zweilous )

description: This brutal Pokémon travels the skies on its six wings. The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Hydreigon, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Hydreigon, gShinyOverworldPalette_Hydreigon )

description: This Pokémon was believed to have been born from the sun. It spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Larvesta, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Larvesta, gShinyOverworldPalette_Larvesta )

description: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it appeared and saved Pokémon from freezing, Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Volcarona, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Volcarona, gShinyOverworldPalette_Volcarona )

description: It has a body and heart of steel. This legendary Pokémon battled against humans to protect Pokémon. Its personality is calm and composed.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Cobalion, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Cobalion, gShinyOverworldPalette_Cobalion )

description: Spoken of in legend, this Pokémon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect Pokémon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Terrakion, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Terrakion, gShinyOverworldPalette_Terrakion )

description: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Legends say this Pokémon used whirlwind-like movements to confound and swiftly cut its opponents.

description: This Flabébé rides a red flower. Immediately after birth, this Pokémon begins flying around in search of a flower it likes.

It receives strength from flowers and gives them some of its energy in return. This Pokémon likes orange flowers best of all.
This Pokémon likes blue flowers best of all. It floats upward using the power emanating from its flower and bobs along lightly through the air.
When evening falls, it searches out a place blooming with flowers of the same white color as itself, and then it goes to sleep.
This Pokémon uses red wavelengths of light to pour its own energy into flowers and draw forth their latent potential.
This Pokémon can draw forth the power hidden within yellow flowers. This power then becomes the moves Floette uses to protect itself.
This Pokémon can draw forth the most power when in sync with orange flowers, compared to flowers of other colors.
Whenever this Pokémon finds flowering plants that are withering, it will bring them back to its territory and care for them.
If it finds someone messing up a flower bed, it will attack them without mercy. This Floette takes particularly good care of white flowers.
The flower it's holding can no longer be found blooming anywhere. It's also thought to contain terrifying power.
This Pokémon creates an impressive flower garden in its territory. It draws forth the power of the red flowers around its neck.
This Pokémon battles by drawing forth the power of yellow flowers. It ruthlessly punishes anyone who tramples on flowering plants.
In times long past, castle governors would lovingly raise Florges to care for their castles' exquisite gardens.
Blue pigments were tremendously expensive in the past, so paintings of blue Florges are highly valuable.
A flower garden made by a white- flowered Florges will be beautifully decorated with flowering plants of many different colors.
