description: It stuns its prey with its psychic powers and then grinds them to mush with its strong teeth. Even Shellder's shell is no match for it.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Bruxish, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Bruxish, gShinyOverworldPalette_Bruxish )

description: This Pokémon is friendly to people and loves children most of all. It comes from deep in the mountains to play with children it likes in town.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Drampa, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Drampa, gShinyOverworldPalette_Drampa )

description: The soul of seaweed adrift in the waves became reborn as this Pokémon. It maintains itself with new infusions of seabed detritus and seaweed.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Dhelmise, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Dhelmise, gShinyOverworldPalette_Dhelmise )

description: It expresses its feelings by smacking its scales. Metallic sounds echo through the tall mountains where Jangmo-o live. They grow little by little battling one another.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_JangmoO, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_JangmoO, gShinyOverworldPalette_JangmoO )

description: It sheds and regrows its scales on a continuous basis. The scales become harder each time they're regrown. Its scaly punches tear its foes to shreds.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_HakamoO, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_HakamoO, gShinyOverworldPalette_HakamoO )
OVERWORLD( sPicTable_KommoO, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_KommoO, gShinyOverworldPalette_KommoO )
OVERWORLD( sPicTable_KommoO, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_KommoO, gShinyOverworldPalette_KommoO )

description: It confuses its enemies by flying too quickly for the eye to follow. It has a hair-trigger temper but forgets what made it angry an instant later.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_TapuKoko, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_TapuKoko, gShinyOverworldPalette_TapuKoko )

description: A fragrant aroma of flowers follows it. As it flutters about, it scatters its strangely glowing scales. Touching them is said to restore good health.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_TapuLele, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_TapuLele, gShinyOverworldPalette_TapuLele )

description: It causes vegetation to grow, and then it absorbs energy from the growth. It pulls large trees up by the roots and swings them around at its enemies.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_TapuBulu, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_TapuBulu, gShinyOverworldPalette_TapuBulu )

description: People say it can create pure water that will wash away any corruption. The dense fog it creates brings the downfall and destruction of its confused enemies.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_TapuFini, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_TapuFini, gShinyOverworldPalette_TapuFini )

description: In ages past, it was called the child of the stars. It's said to be a Pokémon from another world, but no specific details are known.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Cosmog, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Cosmog, gShinyOverworldPalette_Cosmog )

description: Motionless as if dead, its body is faintly warm to the touch. There's something accumulating around the black core within its hard shell.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Cosmoem, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Cosmoem, gShinyOverworldPalette_Cosmoem )

description: It is said to live in another world. The intense light it radiates from the surface of its body can make the darkest of nights light up like midday.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Solgaleo, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Solgaleo, gShinyOverworldPalette_Solgaleo )

description: When its third eye activates, away it flies to another world. This Pokémon devours light, drawing the moonless dark veil of night over the brightness of day.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Lunala, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Lunala, gShinyOverworldPalette_Lunala )

description: One of several mysterious Ultra Beasts. It's unclear whether or not this Pokémon is sentient, but sometimes it can be observed behaving like a young girl.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Nihilego, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Nihilego, gShinyOverworldPalette_Nihilego )

description: This life-form called an Ultra Beast appeared from another world. It shows off its body, but whether that display is a boast or a threat remains unclear.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Buzzwole, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Buzzwole, gShinyOverworldPalette_Buzzwole )

description: One of the dangerous Ultra Beasts, it refuses to touch anything, perhaps because it senses some uncleanness in this world.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Pheromosa, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Pheromosa, gShinyOverworldPalette_Pheromosa )

description: One of the mysterious life-forms known as Ultra Beasts. Astonishing electric shocks emanate from its entire body, according to witnesses.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Xurkitree, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Xurkitree, gShinyOverworldPalette_Xurkitree )

description: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. One kind of Ultra Beast, witnesses saw it flying across the sky by expelling gas from its two arms.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Celesteela, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Celesteela, gShinyOverworldPalette_Celesteela )

description: This Ultra Beast came from the Ultra Wormhole. It seems not to attack enemies on its own, but its sharp body is a dangerous weapon in itself.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Kartana, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Kartana, gShinyOverworldPalette_Kartana )

description: A dangerous Ultra Beast, it has gobbled mountains and swallowed whole buildings, according to reports. But for some reason its droppings have never been found.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Guzzlord, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Guzzlord, gShinyOverworldPalette_Guzzlord )

description: Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts, this life-form, apparently asleep underground, is thought to have come from another world in ancient times.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Necrozma, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Necrozma, gShinyOverworldPalette_Necrozma )

description: This is its form while it is devouring the light of Solgaleo. It pounces on foes and then slashes them with the claws on its four limbs and back.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_NecrozmaDuskMane, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_NecrozmaDuskMane, gShinyOverworldPalette_NecrozmaDuskMane )

description: This is its form while it's devouring the light of Lunala. It grasps foes in its giant claws and rips them apart with brute force.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_NecrozmaDawnWings, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_NecrozmaDawnWings, gShinyOverworldPalette_NecrozmaDawnWings )

description: The light pouring out from all over its body affects living things and nature, impacting them in various ways.
This artificial Pokémon, constructed more than 500 years ago, can understand human speech but cannot itself speak. Its true self is its Soul-Heart, an artificial soul.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Magearna, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Magearna, gShinyOverworldPalette_Magearna )

description: This is its form from almost 500 years ago. Its body is nothing more than a container-its artificial heart is the actual life-form.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_MagearnaOriginal, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_MagearnaOriginal, gShinyOverworldPalette_MagearnaOriginal )

description: Able to conceal itself in the shadows of others, it never appears before humans, so its very existence is the stuff of myth. This Pokémon is craven and cowering.
This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be chosen as a first partner in its own world.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Poipole, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Poipole, gShinyOverworldPalette_Poipole )

description: It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid inside its body. It is one of the organisms known as UBs.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Naganadel, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Naganadel, gShinyOverworldPalette_Naganadel )

description: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life- forms stacked one on top of each other.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Stakataka, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Stakataka, gShinyOverworldPalette_Stakataka )

description: It slithers toward people and explode its head without warning. It is one kind of Ultra Beast.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Blacephalon, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Blacephalon, gShinyOverworldPalette_Blacephalon )

description: It approaches its enemies at the speed of lightning, then tears them limb from limb with its sharp claws.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Zeraora, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Zeraora, gShinyOverworldPalette_Zeraora )

description: It melts particles of iron and other metals found in the subsoil, so it can absorb them into its body of molten steel.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Meltan, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Meltan, gShinyOverworldPalette_Meltan )

description: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Melmetal, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Melmetal, gShinyOverworldPalette_Melmetal )

description: In a distant land, there are legends about a cyclopean giant. In fact, the giant was a Melmetal that was flooded with Gigantamax energy.
When it uses its special stick to strike up a beat, the sound waves produced carry revitalizing energy to the plants and flowers in the area.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Grookey, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Grookey, gShinyOverworldPalette_Grookey )

description: The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Thwackey, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Thwackey, gShinyOverworldPalette_Thwackey )

description: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Rillaboom, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Rillaboom, gShinyOverworldPalette_Rillaboom )

description: Rillaboom has become one with its forest of drums and continues to lay down beats that shake all of Galar.
A warm-up of running around gets fire energy coursing through this Pokémon's body. Once that happens, it's ready to fight at full power.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Scorbunny, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Scorbunny, gShinyOverworldPalette_Scorbunny )

description: Its thick and fluffy fur protects it from the cold and enables it to use hotter fire moves.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Raboot, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Raboot, gShinyOverworldPalette_Raboot )

description: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Cinderace, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Cinderace, gShinyOverworldPalette_Cinderace )

description: Infused with Cinderace's fighting spirit, the gigantic Pyro Ball never misses its targets and completely roasts opponents.
When scared, this Pokémon cries. Its tears pack the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers won't be able to resist weeping.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Sobble, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Sobble, gShinyOverworldPalette_Sobble )

description: A clever combatant, this Pokémon battles using water balloons created with moisture secreted from its palms.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Drizzile, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Drizzile, gShinyOverworldPalette_Drizzile )
OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Inteleon, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Inteleon, gShinyOverworldPalette_Inteleon )

description: Gigantamax Inteleon's Water Gun move fires at Mach 7. As the Pokémon takes aim, it uses the crest on its head to gauge wind and temperature.
Found throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon becomes uneasy if its cheeks are ever completely empty of berries.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Skwovet, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Skwovet, gShinyOverworldPalette_Skwovet )

description: It stashes berries in its tail--so many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesn't notice the loss.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Greedent, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Greedent, gShinyOverworldPalette_Greedent )

description: It will bravely challenge any opponent, no matter how powerful. This Pokémon benefits from every battle--even a defeat increases its strength a bit.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Rookidee, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Rookidee, gShinyOverworldPalette_Rookidee )

description: Smart enough to use tools in battle, these Pokémon have been seen picking up rocks and flinging them or using ropes to wrap up enemies.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Corvisquire, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Corvisquire, gShinyOverworldPalette_Corvisquire )

description: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Corviknight, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Corviknight, gShinyOverworldPalette_Corviknight )

description: Imbued with Gigantamax energy, its wings can whip up winds more forceful than any a hurricane could muster. The gusts blow everything away.
A constant collector of information, this Pokémon is very smart. Very strong is what it isn't.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Blipbug, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Blipbug, gShinyOverworldPalette_Blipbug )

description: It barely moves, but it's still alive. Hiding in its shell without food or water seems to have awakened its psychic powers.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Dottler, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Dottler, gShinyOverworldPalette_Dottler )

description: It's famous for its high level of intelligence, and the large size of its brain is proof that it also possesses immense psychic power.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Orbeetle, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Orbeetle, gShinyOverworldPalette_Orbeetle )

description: Aided by the soft pads on its feet, it silently raids the food stores of other Pokémon. It survives off its ill-gotten gains.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Nickit, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Nickit, gShinyOverworldPalette_Nickit )

description: It secretly marks potential targets with a scent. By following the scent, it stalks its targets and steals from them when they least expect it.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Thievul, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Thievul, gShinyOverworldPalette_Thievul )

description: It anchors itself in the ground with its single leg, then basks in the sun. After absorbing enough sunlight, its petals spread as it blooms brilliantly.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Gossifleur, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Gossifleur, gShinyOverworldPalette_Gossifleur )

description: The seeds attached to its cotton fluff are full of nutrients. It spreads them on the wind so that plants and other Pokémon can benefit from them.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Eldegoss, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Eldegoss, gShinyOverworldPalette_Eldegoss )

description: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Wooloo, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Wooloo, gShinyOverworldPalette_Wooloo )

description: Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampoline. You'll start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Dubwool, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Dubwool, gShinyOverworldPalette_Dubwool )

description: Apparently the itch of its teething impels it to snap its jaws at anything in front of it.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Chewtle, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Chewtle, gShinyOverworldPalette_Chewtle )

description: With jaws that can shear through steel rods, this highly aggressive Pokémon chomps down on its unfortunate prey.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Drednaw, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Drednaw, gShinyOverworldPalette_Drednaw )

description: In the Galar region, there's a tale about this Pokémon chewing up a mountain and using the rubble to stop a flood.
This Pokémon is very popular as a herding dog in the Galar region. As it runs, it generates electricity from the base of its tail.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Yamper, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Yamper, gShinyOverworldPalette_Yamper )

description: This Pokémon generates electricity and channels it into its legs to keep them going strong. Boltund can run nonstop for three full days.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Boltund, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Boltund, gShinyOverworldPalette_Boltund )

description: Most of its body has the same composition as coal. Fittingly, this Pokémon was first discovered in coal mines about 400 years ago.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Rolycoly, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Rolycoly, gShinyOverworldPalette_Rolycoly )

description: It forms coal inside its body. Coal dropped by this Pokémon once helped fuel the lives of people in the Galar region.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Carkol, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Carkol, gShinyOverworldPalette_Carkol )

description: It's usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Coalossal, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Coalossal, gShinyOverworldPalette_Coalossal )

description: Its body is a colossal stove. With Gigantamax energy stoking the fire, this Pokémon's flame burns hotter than 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it's just an apple and nothing more.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Applin, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Applin, gShinyOverworldPalette_Applin )

description: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid capable of causing chemical burns.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Flapple, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Flapple, gShinyOverworldPalette_Flapple )

description: Under the influence of Mega energy, it produces much more sweet nectar, and its shape has changed to resemble a giant apple.
Eating a sweet apple caused its evolution. A nectarous scent wafts from its body, luring in the bug Pokémon it preys on.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Appletun, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Appletun, gShinyOverworldPalette_Appletun )

description: Due to Mega energy, this Pokémon's nectar has thickened. The increased viscosity lets the nectar absorb more damage than before.
Dipplin is two creatures in one Pokémon. Its evolution was triggered by a special apple grown only in one place.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Dipplin, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Dipplin, gShinyOverworldPalette_Dipplin )

description: These capricious syrpents have banded together. On the rare occasion that their moods align, their true power is unleashed.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Hydrapple, SIZE_64x64, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Hydrapple, gShinyOverworldPalette_Hydrapple )

description: As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than 17 pounds of sand.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Silicobra, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Silicobra, gShinyOverworldPalette_Silicobra )

description: When it contracts its body, over 220 pounds of sand sprays from its nose. If it ever runs out of sand, it becomes disheartened.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Sandaconda, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Sandaconda, gShinyOverworldPalette_Sandaconda )

description: Its sand pouch has grown to tremendous proportions. More than 1,000,000 tons of sand now swirl around its body with enough speed and power to pulverize a skyscraper.
It's so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it's battling midfight.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Cramorant, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Cramorant, gShinyOverworldPalette_Cramorant )

description: Cramorant's gluttony led it to try to swallow an Arrokuda whole, which in turn led to Cramorant getting an Arrokuda stuck in its throat.
This Cramorant has accidentally gotten a Pikachu lodged in its gullet. Cramorant is choking a little, but it isn't really bothered.
If it sees any movement around it, this Pokémon charges for it straightaway, leading with its sharply pointed jaw. It's very proud of that jaw.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Arrokuda, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Arrokuda, gShinyOverworldPalette_Arrokuda )

description: This Pokémon has a jaw that's as sharp as a spear and as strong as steel. Apparently Barraskewda's flesh is surprisingly tasty, too.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Barraskewda, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Barraskewda, gShinyOverworldPalette_Barraskewda )

description: It stores poison in an internal poison sac and secretes that poison through its skin. If you touch this Pokémon, a tingling sensation follows.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Toxel, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Toxel, gShinyOverworldPalette_Toxel )

description: When this Pokémon sounds as if it's strumming a guitar, it's actually clawing at the protrusions on its chest to generate electricity.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_ToxtricityAmped, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_ToxtricityAmped, gShinyOverworldPalette_ToxtricityAmped )

description: Capable of generating 15,000 volts of electricity, this Pokémon looks down on all that would challenge it.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_ToxtricityLowKey, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_ToxtricityLowKey, gShinyOverworldPalette_ToxtricityLowKey )

description: It stores flammable gas in its body and uses it to generate heat. The yellow sections on its belly get particularly hot.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Sizzlipede, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Sizzlipede, gShinyOverworldPalette_Sizzlipede )

description: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Centiskorch, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Centiskorch, gShinyOverworldPalette_Centiskorch )

description: The heat that comes off a Mega Centiskorch may destabilize air currents. Sometimes it can even cause storms.
It's very curious, but its means of investigating things is to try to punch them with its tentacles. The search for food is what brings it onto land.
overworld: OVERWORLD( sPicTable_Clobbopus, SIZE_32x32, SHADOW_SIZE_M, TRACKS_FOOT, gOverworldPalette_Clobbopus, gShinyOverworldPalette_Clobbopus )

description: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.
